name: Baby Earol Olive Oil Spray - 10ml
description:
Product details
Baby Earol is a natural and effective method of softening, breaking-up and/or loosening earwax. After ears are clear of earwax using Baby Earol once per week can help keep new earwax soft and help prevent dryness of the skin in the ear canal reducing itching and irritation.
Baby Earol has a simple patented delivery system capable of delivering a discrete metered dose of oil into the outer ear, enhancing ease of use, reducing over application and significantly reducing spillage/mess.
No need for unsightly cotton wool swabs.
  Simple and effective
Softens, breaks-up and loosens earwax prior to its removal
Contains a minimum of 180 metered dose sprays
Moisturises the ear canals helping prevent & soothe itchy ears
Suitable for
Children from 6 months to 12 years
How to use
Apply Baby Earol spray as directed by your pharmacist, audiologist, doctor or nurse.
Hazards and Cautions
Keep all medicines out of the sight and reach of children.
Ingredients
Pharmaceutical grade olive oil and mineral oil.

name: Babymoov Lovenest Original organic cotton head support smokey
description:
Product details
Babymoov Lovenest Original organic cotton head support smokey

The original Lovenest is the memory foam newborn head support pillow which promotes healthy development of a well-rounded head within the first 3 months and while baby's skull is still soft! Developed and patented by French Paediatrician Dr Maidenberg, the Lovenest anti-flat head pillow is an inclined head support designed to cushion baby's head while laid down for play, rest and sleep. Lovenest works by evenly distributing the weight of baby's head across the back of the skull to prevent a flat head (plagiocephaly) from forming in any one spot.

During the first months of their life, your baby can spend hours on their back.To reduce the risk of flat head syndrome, use a Lovenest head support on baby's activity mat, in their cot, pram and even a baby bouncer. This ergonomic head support, which is patented and made in Portugal, is specially angled and shaped to suit the shape of an infant's skull to ensure an even distribution of pressure across the head, whilst allowing total freedom of movement. Very practical, portable and hygienic: the Lovenest is lightweight, adaptable for use between flat and upright surfaces and is easily washable in the washing machine at 30°C

IMPORTANT: Use the Lovenest straight from birth and up to 3 -4 months old or until baby is able to roll over unaided.
Hazards and Cautions
It can be used from birth to 3 months.
Stop using the head support once the child is able to turn unaided.
Important info
Country of Origin: Portugal

Address: 3rd Floor, East Reach House, East Reach, Taunton, TA1 3EN – www.babymoov.co.uk
Parc Industriel des Gravanches, 16, rue Jacqueline Auriol, 63051 Clemont-Ferrand Cedex 2, France – www.babymoov.com
category: Home Babymoov Lovenest Original organic cotton head support smokey

name: AVogel Echinaforce Echinacea Tablets 120 Tablets
description:
Product details
Please note that you must be in to sign for this delivery

A.vogel Echinaforce Echinacea Tablets 120 Tablets

Echinaforce is a traditional herbal remedy used to relieve the symptoms of:

Cold
Flu
Upper respiratory tract infections

Echinaforce helps maintain the body’s resistance by supporting the immune system.
  Age Restriction Purchasing this product online is only suitable for those aged 16 years and over. If you are under 16 years of age and wish to purchase this product, please speak with a pharmacist in store.
How to use
Please read the enclosed leaflet carefully before use.

Patient Information Leaflets are updated periodically by the manufacturer.

Directions for use:

Adults, elderly and children over 12 years: Take 2 tablets two to three times daily.
Start taking this product at the first signs of a cold. Not for use in children under 12.For oral use only. Read leaflet before use.Do not use if you are allergic to Echinacea, other members of the daisy (Asteraceae/Compositae) family or any of the other ingredients or if you are pregnant or breast-feeding.

If symptoms worsen or persist after 10 days, consult your doctor.

Store below 25ºC.

Keep out of the reach and sight of children.

Safety Sealed Container. If seal is broken or missing, do not use.

Hazards and Cautions:

While every care has been taken to ensure this information is always as accurate as possible, food products are regularly improved and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result we recommend that you always read the label carefully before using or consuming any products. Nutritional Reference Value (NRV) information is based on the typical composition of the product. Guideline daily amounts are those for a typical adult (men and women).NRV information for non Boots products is calculated by the manufacturer. Boots has no control over the recipe or nutritional content of such products and information on this site may differ to that given on the product label. We would therefore recommend you do not solely rely on this information and always read the product label. If you have any queries, or you would like advice on Boots products please contact our friendly Customer care team on 0345 609 0055.

This information was last updated 21/01/17
Active ingredients
Echinacea
Ingredients
1 tablet contains 380 mg of extract (as dryextract) from fresh Echinacea purpurea (L.)Moench herb (1:7.5-14.6) and 20 mg ofextract (as dry extract) from fresh Echinacea purpurea (L.) Moench root (1:7.1-12.5).Extraction solvent: ethanol 65% v/v.

This product contains lactose.

See patient information leaflet for further information.

name: Avène XeraCalm AD Lipid-Replenishing Cleansing Oil for Dry Itchy Skin 400ml
description:
Product details
Specifically designed to gently cleanse and help replenish dry to very dry itchy skin while respecting its microbiome. Also suitable to eczema-prone skin. The oil texture seals in moisture for 24h* and helps protect against the drying effect of water. The skin is left feeling comfortable and soft. Formulated with a minimal number of ingredients to minimise risks of allergy. Free from fragrance and soap and suitable for babies, children and adults for face and body.
DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS.

Key benefits:
ANTI-ITCHING*** with I-modulia®. Helps calm itching and irritation sensations from the first use**.

REPLENISHING thanks to the recognised action of Cer-omega. Moisturises for 24h* and protects against the drying effect of water.

SOOTHES thanks to Avène Thermal Spring Water.

FRAGRANCE-FREE.

NON-COMEDOGENIC.

SOAP-FREE.


***Linked to dry skin.

*IH kinetics, 22 subjects with dehydrated skin, one single application. **Tolerance and efficacy study on 55 subjects (adults, children, infants) under dermatological and paediatric control.

Discover Avène’s sensitive, dry, itchy skin skincare regime:
STEP1: Cleanse using Avène XeraCalm A.D. Lipid-Replenishing Cleansing Oil.
STEP2: Sooth, calm and soften the skin with Avène Thermal Spring Water.
STEP3: Moisturise using Avène XeraCalm A.D. Lipid-Replenishing Balm.

We recommend using SPF protection daily, we suggest the Avène Intense Protect SPF50+ for Very Sensitive Skin.

More information on our brand:
ROOTED IN DERMATOLOGY AND HYDROTHERAPY
Avène has over 275 years of expertise in caring for sensitive skin and is recommended by dermatologists worldwide. At the heart of every formula, is clinically proven Avêne Thermal Spring Water to soothe, soften and calm the skin.
In Avène, a small village in the southwest of France that hugs the banks of the Orb River, flows a thermal spring - the source of unique, pure water with remarkable soothing and calming properties.
AVÈNE'S MISSION, PURPOSE & VALUES
Dedicated to sensitive skin and improving quality of life for all skin types, leveraging pharmaceutical and dermatological heritage and expertise.
Suitable for
For dry, itchy, eczema-prone skin.

Suitable for babies, children and adults.
How to use
Apply to face and or body, rinse thoroughly and gently pat dry.
Important info
Country of Origin: France

Address: Les Couquilllous - 81500 Lavaur - France
250 Longwater Avenue, Reading, RG2 6GP
Active ingredients
I-Modulia®: a patented, powerful complex derived from Avène Thermal Spring Water, helps calm itching and irritation caused by dry skin, while helping maintain the skin's natural defence system.

Cer-Omega: derived from evening primrose and rich in omega-6 and ceramides, provides exceptional hydration to help maintain the skin's epidermal barrier.

Avène Thermal Spring Water: to soften, soothe and rebalance the skin.
Ingredients
AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). GLYCERIN. WATER (AQUA). HYDROGENATED STARCH HYDROLYSATE. DISODIUM COCOAMPHODIACETATE. DECYL GLUCOSIDE. POLYSORBATE 20. SODIUM CHLORIDE. CETEARETH-60 MYRISTYL GLYCOL. AQUAPHILUS DOLOMIAE EXTRACT. ARGININE. CITRIC ACID. COCO-GLUCOSIDE. EVENING PRIMROSE OIL/PALM OIL AMINOPROPANEDIOL ESTERS. GLYCERYL OLEATE. GLYCINE. HYDROGENATED VEGETABLE GLYCERIDES CITRATE. SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL (SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS SEED OIL). SODIUM BENZOATE. TOCOPHEROL. TRISODIUM ETHYLENEDIAMINE DISUCCINATE

name: bareMinerals Complexion Rescue Tinted Moisturiser Hydrating Gel Cream Broad Spectrum SPF 30
description:
Product details
Multi-tasking clean makeup.
Combining hydrating skincare benefits with radiant, natural-looking coverage and mineral-based Broad Spectrum SPF 30, this is the ultimate 3-in-1 multi-tasking clean makeup. Proven to boost skin’s hydration by 215% in just 1 week,** the water-infused, oil-free formula smooths onto skin with a refreshing waterburst sensation. The lightweight gel-cream, which is 98% naturally derived, gives you the benefits of makeup, skincare and SPF in one step. Buildable radiant coverage. Our tinted moisturiser can build from sheer to medium coverage, and is available in 20 flexible shades to accommodate a wide range of skin tones. Totally effortless and perfectly portable, this award-winner is your new go-to for a dewy, healthy-looking glow. Full of clean, protective, hydrating coverage, free of dryness. 
HOW TO USE:
We recommend pairing tinted moisturiser with the Smoothing Face Brush. The dual-fiber, synthetic brush is designed to help you blend seamlessly and create a naturally airbrushed finish. Squeeze a pearl-size amount of tinted moisturiser onto the Smoothing Face Brush and blend anywhere you want sheer coverage. For medium coverage, just continue to layer with the same brush. You can also apply with your fingertips: just dot onto your cheeks, forehead, chin and nose, then blend outward. For fuller coverage, apply Complexion Rescue Hydrating Foundation Stick SPF 25 over the tinted moisturiser. 
Tips - For a more matte finish, set with Mineral Veil Finishing Powder - To add blue light protection, first apply Complexion Rescue Defense Radiant Protective Veil.
KEY INGREDIENTS:
- Skin-loving minerals
- Hyaluronic Acid
- Olive
- Squalane
How to use
Apply with your fingertips: Dot onto your cheeks, forehead, chin and nose, then blend outward.
Pair with the Smoothing Face Brush: Squeeze a pearl-sized amount onto the brush and blend.
For more coverage, continue to layer with the brush.
For oily skin, try our COMPLEXION RESCUE® Natural Matte Tinted Moisturiser Mineral SPF 30. Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure.
Hazards and Cautions
Caution: Avoid direct contact with eyes.

SPF:
Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure.
Children under 6 months of age: Ask a doctor.
Sun Protection Measures: Spending time in the sun increases your risk of skin cancer and early skin aging. To decrease this risk, regularly use sunscreen with a Broad Spectrum SPF value of 15 or higher and other sun protection measures including:
Limit time in the sun, especially from 10 a.m. - 2 p.m.
Wear long-sleeved shirts, pants, hats, and sunglasses.
Reapply at least every 2 hours.
Use a water resistant sunscreen if swimming or sweating.

name: Babymore Veni Cot Bed with Drawer - Oak White
description:
Product details
Babymore Veni Cot Bed with Drawer - Oak White
Babymore Veni cot beds offers a modern, warm, and clean design, with its neat lines and a beautifully textured Warm Oak wood effect finish. It will sit stylishly in your baby’s nursery.

The cot beds have three mattress base positions, the highest allowing you to put down, and pick up your new-born baby without too much stress on your back through needlessly bending too low. Then, as your baby grows and starts to move, and explore their world, the mattress base can be lowered through an additional two positions, this keeps them safe and perfectly secure at all ages while the additional teething rails protect their teeth and gums.

When your baby is standing and walking, the Veni cot bed can be easily transformed into a sturdy, smart toddler bed that gives them the familiarity of the cot bed they have been used to for so long. Once transformed, their new toddler bed can be used until they are approximately five years old. Requires a 140 x 70cm mattress (not included).
Assembled Size: L 145 x D 76 x H 88 cm

name: BaByliss Titanium Brilliance Waves Wand 28mm
description:
Product details
  For gorgeous, soft waves that last, the Titanium Brilliance Waves Wand has a 28mm super polished true-titanium barrel for ultra-fast heat transfer and beautiful waves, even on longer hair types. Simply wrap your hair around the barrel for a soft, smooth finish.
  6 digital heat settings up to 210°C offer enhanced heat protection and precise heat control. The Advanced Ceramics™ heating system ensures super-fast heat up and maintains high heat as you style for flawless, lasting waves.
  Soft Waves
Super polished 28mm true-titanium barrel gives fast-action heat transfer for easy styling and lasting loose waves
  Professional styling
Salon-grade Advanced Ceramics™ heating system gives super-fast heat up and maintains high heat on every section for fast styling
  Precise heat control
6 Digital temperature settings from 160°C - 210°C for enhanced heat protection.
  Easy to use
Simply wrap the hair around the extra-long barrel for easy wave formation, ideal for longer hair types
How to use
  Comb through dry hair and divide into sections.
Turn on the appliance and select a heat setting suitable for your hair type.
Wind a section of hair around the length of the barrel.
Hold the end of the hair in place for 5-8 seconds, then release the hair section of hair.
Repeat for each section of hair.
Allow the hair to cool before styling.
After use, switch off and unplug the appliance.
Allow to cool before storing the appliance away.
Hazards and Cautions
  WARNING: Do not use this device in a bathtub, shower, or water-filled reservoir. Always keep out of the reach of children. (During and after use and while cooling) Consumer Helpline : 03705 133 191

name: Bali Body Ultra Dark Self Tanning Mousse 200ml
description:
Product details
Achieve the deepest, darkest glow possible with our Ultra Dark Self Tanning Mousse.

This lightweight, tinted mousse formula provides an ultra-dark and natural-looking result. Enriched with a nourishing blend of natural oils and antioxidants to hydrate and repair the skin.

Key Features:

• Colour guide technology to achieve perfectly customised results for your skin tone
• Green undertone to counteract orange hues
• Lightweight, airy mousse tan with streak-free results
Suitable for
• All skin tones, particularly those with warm skin tones who want to counteract red and orange undertones.
• Formulated for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
• For those who are regular self tanners.
How to use
Step 1: For an even streak free tan, exfoliate prior to application, moisturise any dry areas including elbows, knees, ankles and feet.
Step 2: Shake well. For best results, apply using our Luxe Tanning Mitt in long sweeping motions, starting at the ankles and working your way up. Then move towards your back, and apply in the same motion. Ensure all areas are covered before lightly gliding any excess tan from the mitt over your hands and feet.
Step 3: Allow 4 - 8 hours before showering to reveal your developed tan. For a deeper tan, re-apply BB self tanning mousse 30 minutes after initial application.
Hazards and Cautions
Warning: Patch test before use. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. For external use only. Wash palms after use. May stain clothing. Avoid contact with eyes. This product does not contain sunscreen and does not protect against sunburn. Repeated exposure of unprotected skin while tanning may increase the risk of skin ageing, skin cancer and other harmful effects to the skin even if you do not burn. Store in a cool, dark place.

name: BaByliss Straight and Curl Brilliance Rose Gold Straightener
description:
Product details
Create endless styles from sleek straight hair to beautiful bold waves and curls. Customise styles with the combination of smooth-glide titanium plates for effortless straightening and ultra-smooth stainless steel curved housing to create perfect curls. Featuring salon high heat and variable temperature settings for enhanced heat protection and long-lasting style.

Super polished plates
Smooth-glide true titanium ceramic plates with superior heat transfer for effortless straightening

Fast results
Advanced Ceramics™ heating system gives super-fast heat up and maintains consistent heat on every section

Tames frizz
Ionic system releases frizz-controlling ions to smooth hair and add shine

Flawless curls and waves
Ultra-smooth stainless steel curved housing for effortless styling

Salon high heat
Up to 235°C with variable heat for lasting results

Enhanced heat protection
5 temperature settings to suit all hair types
How to use
Straightening
Comb through dry hair and divide into sections.
Turn on the appliance and select a heat setting suitable for your hair type.
Take a section of hair and place between the plates, close to the roots.
Hold the hair firmly between the plates and slide down the length of the hair, from root to tip.
Repeat as necessary.
Allow the hair to cool before combing through.
After use, switch off and unplug the appliance
Allow to cool before storing the appliance away.

Creating Curls
Ensure the cool tips are in position at the end of the appliance.
Turn on the appliance and select a heat setting suitable for your hair type
Separate a section of hair. The smaller the section the more defined the curl. The larger the section the looser the curl.
Take the hair section and place between the plates, roughly 3 inches from the roots.
Holding the appliance handle in one hand and the cool tips in the other turn the appliance 180° back on itself so that the hair is wrapped once around the outside of the appliance.
Slowly glide the appliance along the length of hair from root to tip in a downward motion.
Release the appliance from the hair.
Hazards and Cautions
WARNING: Do not use this device in a bathtub, shower, or water-filled reservoir. Always keep out of the reach of children. (During and after use and while cooling) Consumer Helpline : 03705 133 191

name: Babymoov U-Shape Maternity Pillow Wind Blue Dandelions
description:
Product details
The U-shape micro-bead maternity pillow with button fastening for feeding

• Adaptable: can be used during pregnancy and after birth for feeding
• Soft and adjustable for maximum comfort
• The cover is made from super-soft organic cotton, GOTS-certified (Global Organic Textile Standard)
• Made in Europe
• Very fine, Toxproof-certified (non-toxic) microbeads make it silent and lightweight
• Ingenious fastening system 
• Comes beautifully packed in a reusable recycled plastic bag
• Refillable (bag of microbeads sold separately)

The B. LOVE organic cotton maternity pillow is supportive and relaxing. Enjoy unrivalled comfort whilst bonding with your baby thanks to extremly fine, silent microbeads.

This pillow is designed to soothe any pregnancy-related aches and pains (backache, lumbar pain, tightness in the lower abdomen, heavy legs, etc.). It fits around you whatever position you are in with its ergonomic shape and ultra fine microbeads. B. LOVE pillow also brings you unrivalled comfort with its super soft and stretchy organic cotton cover. 

Whether you are sitting or lying down, in bed or on the sofa, the pillow moulds to your body shape giving a memory foam-like feeling. You can even use it in your pre-natal yoga class, open or closed using its fastening system. 

Once you've brought baby home, this adaptable pillow takes on a whole new purpose. Use for easier breastfeeding or bottle-feeding. Its slightly sloped shape means you will always be at the right height and in a comfortable position, whilst its thinner ends are great for propping comfortably against your back. 
A button fastening system holds the pillow in place and leaves your hands free for feeding your baby.

Here at Babymoov, we love products that last a lifetime. That's why you can use your pillow for reading or chilling out or as a support cushion for baby when they sit for the first time. Plus, the pillow has a secure zip fastening so it can be refilled with microbeads.

Inspired by nature, this cushion features subtle, feather-light motifs to add a romantic feel to your home.

To take care of future generations, we are gradually changing our manufacturing methods as well as working together to embrace more environmentally-friendly practices:

- The B.Love maternity pillow is made in Europe, reducing our manufacturing carbon footprint

- As a hallmark of environmental responsibility, the pillow carries Oeko-Tex (R) certification to guarantee the materials used are high quality and non-toxic for your baby

- The outer cover is made from super soft organic cotton, GOTS-certified (Global Organic Textile Standard)

 - Toxproof-certified (non-toxic) microbeads make it silent and lightweight 

- Comes in an eco-friendly reusable recycled plastic bag 

• Composition: Cover: 95% Organic Cotton, 5% Elastane
• Inner cover: 97% Polyester, 3% Elastane
• Filling: expanded polystyrene microbeads
• Care: Cover is machine washable at 30°C
• Pillow is hand wash only
• Not suitable for the tumble dryer
• Product dimensions (L x D x H): Unfolded: 190 cm / Folded: 85 x 40 x 15 cm
Hazards and Cautions
WARNING. Do not leave the child unattended

name: Aptamil 1 First Infant Milk from Birth 800g
description:
Product details
Nutritionally Complete Infant Formula* *Suitable as a sole source of nutrition from birth and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months. The beginning of your baby's life is a special and beautiful time. Our passionate team of more than 500 scientists and experts have developed our Aptamil® First Infant Milk, inspired by 50 years of research in early life science. Our formulation is nutritionally complete and suitable from birth as a breastmilk substitute. Aptamil® First Infant Milk is a breastmilk substitute and is suitable for babies from birth.

Inspired by 50 years of Research in Early Life Science Supporting you on your baby's journey.
Suitable for
Suitable for infants from birth up to 6 months*. For 6+ months, use Aptamil 2 Follow On Baby Milk Formula Powder 6-12 Months 800g.

*Breastfeeding is best.
How to use
Preparation and Usage

A Pack Designed for You
Double safety seal
To be sure your formula has not been opened and retains its freshness
Scoop leveller
To get the dose just right
Scoop storer
To keep your scoop and hands out of the power

Preparing Your Baby's Feed
Approx. age: Up to 2 weeks; Approx. weight: 3.5kg, 7 3/4lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 3; Quantity of water per feed: 90ml, 3fl. oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 6
Approx. age: 2-4 weeks; Approx. weight: 3.9kg, 8 1/2lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 4; Quantity of water per feed: 120ml, 4fl. oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 4-8 weeks; Approx. weight: 4.7kg, 10 1/2lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 5; Quantity of water per feed: 150ml, 5fl. oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 8-12 weeks; Approx. weight: 5.4kg, 12lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 6; Quantity of water per feed: 180ml, 6fl. oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 3-4 months; Approx. weight: 6.2kg, 13 3/4lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 6;Quantity of water per feed: 180ml, 6fl. oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 4-5 months; Approx. weight: 6.9kg, 15 1/4lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 7; Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7fl. oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 5-6 months; Approx. weight: 7.6kg, 16 3/4lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 7; Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7fl. oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 7-12 months; Approx. weight: -kg, -lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 7; Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7fl. oz; No. feeds per 24 hours: 3

Assumes weaning at 6 months.

Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.

Important: Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop in this pack may change from time to time.

Prep: Wash hands and sterillise all utensils.

1 Water: Boil 1 litre of freshly run water in a kettle then leave to cool for 30 minutes and no more so the water can reach the recommended temperature of 70°C. When ready, pour the right amount of water into a sterilised bottle, as per the feeding guide. Do not use artficially softened or repeatedly boiled water,
2 Powder: Using the scoop, add the powder to the water, as per the feeding guide. To make sure the right amount of powder is added, use the leveller on the inside of the box to level off the scoops.
3 Don't press or heap the powder as adding too much or too little formula could make your baby ill.
4 Shake: Place the sterilised teat and cap on the bottle and shake straight away. For best results, shake vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds, until all of the powder is dissolved.
5 Cool the bottle by placing under a cold running tap or in a bowl of cold water, and check the temperature by placing a few drops in the inside of your wrist. The formula should feel lukewarm, but not hot. If possible, we'd recommend starting the feed straight away and always finishing within 2 hours.

Important Feeding
Make up each feed as required.
For hygiene reasons, do not store made up feeds, discard unfinished feeds as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never add extra scoops or anything else to your baby's feed.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.

Storage
Store powder in a cool, dry place.
Do not refrigerate.
Use powder within 4 weeks of opening.
Hazards and Cautions
Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.

While every care has been taken to ensure this information is as accurate as possible, recipes and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice.

Safety Warning:
This product is made to strict hygiene standards but because powdered formula milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions on preparation and storage may make your baby ill.

Important notice:
Breastfeeding is best. Infant Milk is suitable from birth, when babies are not breastfed and should only be used on the advice of a doctor, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care.

When bottle feeding, do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.

name: Aptamil 2 Pre-Measured Tabs Follow On Milk 6-12 Months 24 x 24g 576g
description:
Product details
Here to support your feeding journey, Aptamil Follow On baby milk Pre-measured Tabs are:

● Easy to carry, great for on the go
● Dissolves quickly, just add to water*
● No scoop, no mess. 1 tab = 1 scoop. Easier to prepare than powdered formulations
● Trust the UK’s Number 1 brand for follow on milk**

Say goodbye to scoops with Aptamil 2 Follow On Milk Pre-measured Tabs. Great for on the go, our pre-measured tabs are easy to carry and accurately measured, 1 tab = 1 scoop. Quick to dissolve, just add to water* by following the full preparation instructions. Inspired by 50 years of breastmilk research, our team of scientists have developed Aptamil Follow On baby milk, the UK’s number 1 brand for follow on milk*. Enriched with key nutrients such as Vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system and iron to support normal cognitive development, Aptamil Follow On Milk is tailored to complement your baby’s weaning diet between 6-12 months. Supporting you on your baby’s journey Your baby’s nutritional needs are changing as they grow.

Aptamil Toddler milk 3 is designed specially to support your baby’s growth and development from 1 year as part of a varied balanced diet, as it contains vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system, and normal growth and development of bone. *Each tab should be added to 30ml/1 fl.oz of water. Always follow preparation instructions **Source: IRI Infoscan Total Market MAT w/e 05/11/2022 domestic volume sales for Aptamil Follow On Milk Total UK The beginning of your baby’s life is a special and beautiful time, and we know just how important it is that your baby gets the nutrition they need at every stage of their development. Inspired by 50 years of breastmilk research, our passionate team of scientists have brought together our blend of ingredients and unique process, to support your baby on their feeding journey.
Suitable for
Suitable for babies aged 6-12 months*. For 1+ years, use Aptamil 3 Toddler Milk Powder 1+ Years 800g.

*Breastfeeding is best.
How to use
Preparation and Usage

Accurately Measured
Just Add to Water*
Preparing Your Baby's Feed
Approx. 1 beaker : No. of tabs per feed (1 tab = 4.8g): 7; Quantity of water per feed ml: 210, fl.oz: 7

After 6 months, once weaning is established, we recommend giving your baby about 1 pint (500-600ml) per day. Aptamil® follow on milk is specially formulated to help meet the increased nutritional needs of infants from 6 to 12 months. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.

This product is made to strick hygiene standards but because powdered formula milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions on preparation and storage may make your baby ill.

Prep: Wash hands and sterilise all utensils.
1 Water: Boil 1 litre of freshly run water in a kettle leave to cool for 30 minutes and no more so the water can reach the recommended temperature of 70°C.
2 When ready, pour the right amount of water into a sterilised beaker, as per the feeding guide. Do not use artificially softened or repeatedly boiled water.
3 Powder: Tear off the top of the sachet and without touching the tabs, add the correct number to the water. Adding too many or too few tabs could make your baby ill.
4 Shake: Place the sterilised lid on the beaker and shake straight away. For best results, shake vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds, until all of the powder is dissolved.
5 Cool the beaker by placing under a cold running tap or in a bowl of cold water, and check the temperature by placing a few drops on the inside of your wrist. The formula should feel lukewarm, but not hot. If possible, we'd recommend starting the feed straight away and always finishing within 2 hours.

Important Feeding and Storage Advice

Do not feed babies undissolved tabs.
Handle with care. Tabs may break when dropped or held too firmly.
Make up each feed as required.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.

Follow the preparation instructions at all times, even when on the go.

Pre-Measured Follow On Milk Tabs

- Easy to carry, great for on the go
- Dissolves quickly, Just add to water*
- No scoop, no mess
- Easier to prepare than powdered formulations
- 1 tab = 1 scoop

*Each tab should be added to 30ml/1 fl. oz water.

Always follow preparation instructions.
Hazards and Cautions
Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.

While every care has been taken to ensure this information is as accurate as possible, recipes and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice.

Storage
When you do not use all the tabs in a sachet, fold the top of the sachet.
Fasten it with a dip or store in an air-tight container. (Clip not included)
After opening the sachet, use the remaining tabs as soon as possible, within one week.
Store in a cool, dry place.
Do not refrigerate.
For best before, see top of pack

name: BaByliss Big Hair 2885U Spinning Brush
description:
Product details
BaByliss Big Hair Spinning Brush 2885U

The BaByliss Big Hair airstyler has an iconic rotating brush to add dramatic volume and shine to styles and replicate a salon-perfect blow-dry at home. The large ceramic barrel adds fullness and body whilst the soft mixture of natural boar and nylon bristles create ultimate smoothness and shine. The super ionic conditioning leaves hair with a frizz-free, high shine finish.

With its large 50mm ceramic barrel that adds fullness and body as you dry, while the soft mixture of natural boar and nylon bristles work with the ionic conditioning system to give your hair ultimate smoothness and shine.

The built-in super ionic generator sends a stream of negative ions which act to neutralise static charges as you dry, immediately enhancing the look and feel of your hair.

The BaByliss Big Hair styler features 2 heat settings as well as a cool shot setting to give total styling control. Use the cool setting to set and finish your style for long-lasting effect.

700W

Large 50mm ceramic barrel

Soft bristles for ultimate smoothness and shine

Super ionic conditioning for a frizz-free, high shine finish

2 heats plus a cool setting

2 rotation speeds for total control

Multi-directional brush

Hinged rear filter

Protective cover

2.5m longer length cord

2 year guarantee

Helpful Styling Tips from BaByliss

If you have long or thick hair, you may find it quicker and easier to use a hairdryer first, to rough dry your hair and remove the excess moisture. For added volume, turn your head upside down as you dry.

Once the hair is 80% dry, you should start to create your style using the styler.

- WARNING: Do not use this device in a bathtub, shower, or water-filled reservoir.

name: Aptamil 1 First Infant Milk from Birth 200ml
description:
Product details
Aptamil First Infant Milk 200ml is:

● Ready to feed baby milk
● Suitable from birth and nutritionally complete formula
● Breastmilk substitute ● Contains DHA (Omega-3)
● No Palm Oil Product marketing:

The beginning of your baby’s life is a special and beautiful time. Our passionate team of over 500 scientists and experts have developed Aptamil 1 First Infant Milk, inspired by 50 years of research in early life science. Containing DHA** (Omega-3), and made with a palm oil free blend, Aptamil First Infant formula is a breastmilk substitute and is suitable as the sole source of nutrition from birth and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months. Our 200ml bottles of Aptamil First infant milk is ready to feed. Supporting you on your baby’s journey Aptamil 2 Follow On Milk is tailored for babies from 6-12 months as part of a varied, balanced diet. Aptamil Follow On baby formula contains Vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system. *Suitable as a sole source of nutrition from birth and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months. As required by the legislation for all infant formula **As required by the legislation for all infant formula Aptamil 1 is inspired by 50 years of research in early life science. Our experts are here for you.

Our team of baby feeding advisors are here to listen and can offer personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting. Visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.
Suitable for
Suitable for infants from birth up to 6 months*. For 6-12 Months, use Aptamil 2 Follow On Baby Milk Formula Liquid 6-12 Months 200ml.

*Breastfeeding is best.
How to use
Preparation and Usage
Preparing Your Baby's Feed

Approx. age: Up to 2 weeks, Approx. weight: 3.5kg, 7 3/4lb, Single feed: 90ml, 3fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 6
Approx. age: 2-4 weeks, Approx. weight: 3.9kg, 8 1/2lb, Single feed: 120ml, 4fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 4-8 weeks, Approx. weight: 4.7kg, 10 1/2lb, Single feed: 150ml, 5fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 8-12 weeks, Approx. weight: 5.4kg, 12lb, Single feed: 180ml, 6fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 3-4 months, Approx. weight: 6.2kg, 13 3/4lb, Single feed: 180ml, 6fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 4-5 months, Approx. weight: 6.9kg, 15 1/4lb, Single feed: 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 5-6 months, Approx. weight: 7.6kg, 16 3/4lb, Single feed: 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 7-12 months, Approx. weight: -kg, -lb, Single feed: 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 3

Assumes weaning at 6 months.

Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is give as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.

Please follow these instructions carefully. Failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill.

1. Wash hands and sterilise all utensils according to manufacturers' instructions.
2. Shake bottle well. Pour the required amount of milk into a sterilised feeding bottle.
3. Serve at room temperature, or warmed if desired. If warmed, check temperature of feed.

Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding. Never leave your baby alone during feeding.

Storage
1. For hygiene reasons, discard unfinished milk in the feeding bottle as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
2. Any unused milk in this 200ml bottle can be stored by replacing the cap, storing upright in a refrigerator and used within 24 hours.
3. Store unopened bottles in a cool, dry place.
Hazards and Cautions
Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.

As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice.

Important notice Breastfeeding is best for babies. It is recommended that Aptamil First milk be used only on the advice of a doctor, midwife, health visitor, public health nurse, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care.

When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your health professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night. Never leave your baby alone during feeding. Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.

Babymore Luno Cot Bed with Drawer - Oak
Babymore Luno cot beds offers a modern, warm, and clean design, with its neat lines and a beautifully textured Warm Oak wood effect finish. It will sit stylishly in your baby’s nursery.

The cot beds have three mattress base positions, the highest allowing you to put down, and pick up your new-born baby without too much stress on your back through needlessly bending too low. Then, as your baby grows and starts to move, and explore their world, the mattress base can be lowered through an additional two positions, this keeps them safe and perfectly secure at all ages while the additional teething rails protect their teeth and gums.

When your baby is standing and walking, the Luno cot can be easily transformed into a sturdy, smart toddler bed that gives them the familiarity of the cot bed they have been used to for so long. name: Babymoov Aquani Anti-Uv Paddling Pool Playpen 50 SPF - Mariniere
description:
Product details
"Why will you love it?
• High anti-UV protection (SPF 50+)
• 3 in 1: play area, tent and paddling pool
• Pop-up system for easy folding and unfolding
• Waterproof fabric for use as a paddling pool
• Can hold up to 75 litres of water
• Removable mosquito net
• Detachable canopy
• Comfortable and removable mattress 
• 2 detachable toys with clips in different places
• 4 pegs for greater stability
• Storage bag with wide shoulder strap""Nothing beats going out with your baby when it's warm and sunny! 
Before the age of one, babies do not produce enough melanin to protect them from the sun’s UV rays. So when you go out, we recommend protecting your little one with high protection sun cream, sunglasses and a hat, and putting them in an anti-UV playpen!
The Aquani helps you to protect your baby from the sun. With its high protection (SPF 50+), it blocks up to 99% of harmful rays (UVA and UVB). It also protects your little one from sand, wind and insects thanks to its folding mosquito net. Your little one can easily play with the toys provided. As your baby gets older and bigger, you can clip the toys in different places. Crinkly paper, coloured rings... your little one is spoiled for choice for early learning!  
Lying comfortably on the Aquani’s mattress, they can also sleep safely wherever you are.
The Babymoov Aquani is adaptable so you can continue to use it as your baby grows. The Aquani has a removable canopy and waterproof fabric. Just remove the mattress to turn it into a large paddling pool (up to 75 litres). Your baby can splash around in complete safety with you there alongside. On the inside, remove the canopy to turn your Aquani into a playpen or ball pit!
Well designed, practical and easy to assemble, the Aquani is easy to take with you in its carry bag with wide shoulder strap. It is easy to set up and store away thanks to its pop-up system. "

name: Avène Very High Protection Anti-ageing SPF50 Face Sun Cream for Sensitive Skin 50ml
description:
Product details
Avène Very High Protection Anti-ageing SPF50+ Face Sun Cream for Sensitive Skin 50ml

Long‐lasting, SPF50, face sun cream for ageing sensitive skin.
Smart, multifunctional sunscreen with unique anti‐ageing properties. Made with our SunSitive® complex, a unique photo protective system with a minimum of filters, long‐lasting stability and efficacy and offering high protection against UVB and UVA rays (short and long). Also formulated using the powerful antioxidant Pre‐Tocopheryl, for cellular protection against free radicals, Avène thermal spring water, with soothing and anti‐irritating properties and Ascofilline to reinforce collagen. Light, dry touch and non sticky, it can be used under/over or as your usual daily cream for powerful, non‐irritating sun protection.

Key Ingredients
SunSitive® Complex: exclusive, broad UVA-UVB sun protection using only 4 sun filters.
Ascofiline: to help reinforce and promote collagen regenerationâ.
Pre-Tocopheryl:  a powerful antioxidant, Vitamin E derivative,
Avène Thermal Spring Water: unique; anti-irritating active with soothing properties that leave the skin feeling soothed; supple and soft.


  About Avene
Avène is a contemporary dermo-cosmetic skincare brand, recommended by healthcare professionals worldwide and is trusted by millions worldwide.  The thermal spring water source from which our products derive has been used to care for sensitive skin for over 270 years.

Dedicated to dermatology, Avène offers expert skincare products specially developed for sensitive skin. At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured.

Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin.
How to use
Before exposure to the sun, apply the product evenly onto the skin. Re‐apply sunscreen frequently, especially after swimming or prolonged periods of exposure. Avoid exposure between noon and 4pm.
Ingredients
Avene Thermal Spring Water (Avene Aqua), C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Methylene Bis-Benzotriazolyl Tetramethylbutylphenol [Nano], Water (Aqua), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Diethylhexyl Butamido Triazone, Silica, Glycerin, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil (Cocos Nucifera Oil), Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Mica, Decyl Glucoside, Trimethylpentanediol/Adipic Acid/Glycerin Crosspolymer, 1,2-Hexanediol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Ascophyllum Nodosum Extract, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Benzoic Acid, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Carbomer, Disodium Edta, Glyceryl Behenate, Glyceryl Dibehenate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil (Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil), Iron Oxides (Ci 77492), (Ci 77491), (Ci 77499), Oxothiazolidine, Propylene Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Hydroxide, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Glucoside, Tribehenin, Xanthan Gum.

name: Babymore Air Motion Gliding Crib - Grey
description:
Product details
The Babymore Air Motion Gliding Crib is easy to use and designed to give your baby a safe and comfortable place to sleep. It looks stylish and fits the aesthetics of a modern home, giving it a contemporary vibe. 
The gliding motion can be operated by a parent, but it can also start on its own when your baby stirs or rolls, putting them back to sleep or a nap. Its smooth, quiet movement is great for soothing your baby to sleep. The crib can also be locked so it doesn’t glide, a useful feature as your baby gets older and is ready for their transition to a cot or cot bed. 
The crib comes with a safe reflux wedge that raises the baby to help ease the symptoms of reflux and colic.
This stand-alone crib is suitable for overnight sleep from birth up to 6 months or 9 kg.
The Babymore Air Motion Glide Crib is lightweight, making it perfect if you want to be able to move it around your home. Assembly and disassembly are very simple and quick-you can do this in less than a minute! To take it apart, just take off the small legs and fold the bassinet. No other tools are needed. The crib fits in a compact travel bag and weighs only 6 kg. You can take it with you for overnight stays as your travel cot for the first 6 months.
The crib has a perfect height of 74 cm, offering easy access to your baby anywhere in your home. The Air Motion Gliding Crib is designed to be positioned next to your bed. Its standalone design and double mesh sides ensure that you can see your baby at all times, yet they are in their own, safe sleeping space. 
The Babymore Air Motion Gliding Crib has won GOLD in the 2023 Mother & Baby Awards for ‘Best Cot, Crib, or Moses Basket” category along with GOLD in the 2022 Made for Mums Awards.
We recommend the Babymore Air Motion Gliding Crib fitted sheets, which are designed specifically for this crib and come in a pack of two sheets. 
Key features:
Gentle side to side motion, “floating on air” gliding sensation
Breathable mesh panels with machine washable cover 
Reflux wedge included 
Comfortable breathable fibre core mattress - chemical free with a washable cover
Assembles in less than a minute and is super lightweight
Folds away easily and quickly into a small travel bag
Award winning - Mother & Baby Award 2023 GOLD / Made for Mums 2022 GOLD
Suitable for
From birth to 6 months or 9 kg
How to use
Instructions manual included and available on www.babymore.co.uk

Safety is our top priority. The 2 in 1 Mimi is equipped with a reliable braking system that’s both sand-resistant and water-resistant, ensuring stability and peace of mind when stopping or parking. With its sleek design and premium materials, the 2 in 1 Mimi offers both functionality and style, meaning all you have to think about is where your next adventure is going to take you.

name: BARBER PRO Anti-Ageing Vitamin C Sheet Mask
description:
Product details
The BARBER PRO ANTI-AGEING Vitamin C Sheet Mask is an energising formula that tackles the signs of tiredness and ageing. Using the power of Blueberry, Yuzu Citrus and Sea Buckthorn, this formula will increase the skin’s hydration, brighten the complexion and reduce the appearance of dark circles, redness, fine lines and wrinkles.
  The sheet mask uses our NEW 100% Biodegradable Packaging. Our plastic pouches will also degrade to nothing more than carbon dioxide, water and biomass. This means no microplastics left behind to pose a threat to the environment. The sheet mask itself is constructed with bamboo fibres, which not only minimise skin sensitivity but also makes the mask biodegradable. 

Rich in Vitamin C, Blueberries provide vital nutrients to the cells to allow them to function to a high capacity and in turn helps your skin to appear brighter and more energised. Yuzu Fruit stimulates collagen production which renews the cells, improving elasticity and creating a smoother and more even surface. Sea Buckthorn deeply hydrates the skin as well as protecting it from environmental stressors.
Using this sheet mask weekly will help you to fight dull skin and wrinkles to achieve a bright, youthful and healthy complexion.
  The BARBER PRO ANTI-AGEING Vitamin C Sheet Mask is 100% plant based.
Suitable for
Vegans
How to use
1. Cleanse the skin to prepare for mask application
2. Remove the mask from the packaging and carefully unfold the mask
3. Place on your face and ensure good coverage, wear for 15 - 20 minutes
4. After 15 - 20 minutes has passed, remove the mask
Hazards and Cautions
External use only. Avoid contact with eyes and damaged skin. In case of eye contact, rinse thoroughly with water. Keep out of reach of children.
Ingredients
Vaccinium Angustifolium (Blueberry) Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Oil, Hibiscus Esculentus Fruit Extract, Dioscorea Opposita Root Extract, Linum Usitatissimum Seed Extract, Salvia Hispanica Seed Extract, Hedera Helix (Ivy) Leaf Extract, Decyl glucoside, Limonene, Citral

name: Bambaw Bamboo Cotton Buds - Pack Of 400
description:
Product details
Bambaw Bamboo Cotton Buds - Pack Of 400

Cotton buds are convenient and ordinary, so it is easy to forget about their impact on the environment. But we love using them: It has been estimated that we used over 500 billion of these worldwide in 2017.

Sadly, most are made of plastic, which needs centuries to break down. In the meantime, animals mistake it for food, which eventually kills them.

A sustainable alternative to plastic is bamboo. Bamboo cotton buds are biodegradable while being as sturdy and durable as the plastic version. So, they are the perfect alternative.
How to use
Use the bamboo cotton bud as a conventional cotton bud. Afterwards, you can dispose of it in your personal or local compost. A detailed digital user manual is provided.
Hazards and Cautions
Do not insert in your nose or ear canal

name: Aptamil 2 Follow On Milk Formula Multipack 6 x 200ml
description:
Product details
Here to support your feeding journey, our ready to drink Aptamil Follow On Milk is:
The UK’s Number 1 brand for follow on milk*

Contains vitamins A and C, and with Iron for normal cognitive development

Contains GOS/FOS - our blend of Galacto and Fructo-oligosaccharides

Ready to drink portable bottles.


Inspired by 50 years of breastmilk research, our team of scientists have developed Aptamil Follow On baby milk, the UK’s number 1 brand for follow on milk*. Enriched with key nutrients such as Vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system and iron to support normal cognitive development, Aptamil Follow On Milk is tailored to complement your baby’s weaning diet between 6-12 months. ~~Our 6 pack of easy to carry 200ml bottles of baby formula comes ready to drink, for when you’re on the go. Also available in milk powder format.

Supporting you on your baby’s journey

Your baby’s nutritional needs are changing as they grow. Aptamil Toddler milk 3 is designed specially to support your baby’s growth and development from 1 year as part of a varied balanced diet, as it contains vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system, and normal growth and development of bone.

*Source: IRI Infoscan Total Market MAT w/e 05/11/2022 domestic volume sales for Aptamil Follow On Milk Total UK

Brand story:
The beginning of your baby’s life is a special and beautiful time, and we know just how important it is that your baby gets the nutrition they need at every stage of their development.

Inspired by 50 years of breastmilk research, our passionate team of scientists have brought together our blend of ingredients and unique process, to support your baon their feeding journey.

Trust us to support your unique experience at every step, from birth to toddlerhood. Our midwives, nutritionists and feeding advisors are always on hand to talk about feeding your baby.
Suitable for
Suitable for babies aged 6-12 Months*. For 12+ Months and up to 3 Years, use Aptamil 3 Toddler Formula Milk Liquid 200ml or Aptamil 3 Toddler Formula Milk Liquid 1L. *Breastfeeding is best.
How to use
Preparation and feeding guide
After 6 months, once weaning is established, we recommend giving your baby about 1 pint (500-600ml) per day. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.

Please follow these instructions carefully. Failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill.
Wash hands and sterilise all utensils according to manufacturers' instructions

Shake bottle well. Pour the required amount of milk into a sterilised feeding beaker.

Serve at room temperature, or warmed if desired. If warmed, check temperature of feed.


Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.

Storage
For hygiene reasons, discard unfinished milk in the feeding beaker as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.

Any unused milk in this 200ml bottle can be stored by replacing the cap, storing upright in a refrigerator and used within 24 hours.

Store unopened bottles in a cool, dry place.
Hazards and Cautions
Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.

While every care has been taken to ensure this information is as accurate as possible, recipes and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice.

Important notice
Breastfeeding is best for babies. Aptamil® Follow On Milk is only for babies over 6 months, as part of a mixed diet. It should not be used as a breastmilk substitute before 6 months. The decision to start weaning including the use of this product before 6 months should be made only on the advice of a doctor, midwife, health visitor, public health nurse, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care, based on baby's individual needs.

Do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.

name: Aptamil 1 First Infant Milk Starter Pack from Birth 6 x 70ml 420ml
description:
Product details
Aptamil® First Infant Milk is a breastmilk substitute and is suitable for babies from birth. Nutritionally Complete Infant Formula* *Suitable as a sole source of nutrition from birth and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months. As required by the legislation for all infant formula. A Ready to Feed Pack Designed for You - 6 Ready to feed bottles of Aptamil® First Infant Milk - supplying approx. 24 hours worth of feeds - 6 Orthodontic shaped teats - for optimised flow, which screw directly onto the bottle - Pre-sterilised - ready to use with no preparation required.
Suitable for
Suitable for infants from birth up to 6 months*. For 6-12 Months, use Aptamil 2 Follow On Baby Milk Formula Liquid 6-12 Months 200ml.

*Breastfeeding is best.
How to use
Preparation and Usage

Preparing Your Baby's Feed

Check cap before opening. Do not use if seal is broken. Please follow these instructions carefully. Failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill.

1. Wash hands. Shake bottle well.
2. Unscrew cap, add sterilised teat.
3. Serve at room temperature or warmed if required.
4. To warm the feed, stand sealed bottle in hot water. Remember to test the temperature on your wrist before feeding the baby.

Approx. age: 1 week*, Approx. weight: 3.5kg, 7 3/4lb, Single feed: 30-70ml, No of feeds per 24 hours: 6
Approx. age: up to 2 weeks*, Approx. weight: 3.5kg, 7 3/4lb, Single feed: 70-90ml, No of feeds per 24 hours: 6-8
Approx. age: 2-4 weeks, Approx. weight: 3.9kg, 8 1/2lb, Single feed: 120ml, No of feeds per 24 hours: 5-6
Approx. age: 4-8 weeks, Approx. weight: 4.7kg, 10 1/2lb, Single feed: 150ml, No of feeds per 24 hours: 5-6
Approx. age: 8-12 weeks, Approx. weight: 5.4kg, 12lb, Single feed: 180ml, No of feeds per 24 hours: 5-6
Approx. age: 3-4 months, Approx. weight: 6.2kg, 13 3/4lb, Single feed: 180ml, No of feeds per 24 hours: 5-6
Approx. age: 4-5 months, Approx. weight: 6.9kg, 15 1/4lb, Single feed: 210ml, No of feeds per 24 hours: 5-6
Approx. age: 5-6 months, Approx. weight: 7.6kg, 16 3/4lb, Single feed: 210ml, No of feeds per 24 hours: 5-6

*Newborn babies may take only small amounts of infant formula to start with. Assumes weaning at 6 months. Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.

Important Feeding Advice
Before use: check best before date.
Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.
For hygiene reasons, discard unfinished milk in the feeding bottle immediately after use, and always after 1 hour.
Bottles and teats for single use only.
Hazards and Cautions
Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.

Breastfeeding is best for babies. It is recommended that Cow & Gate First Infant Milk from newborn be used only on the advice of a doctor, midwife, health visitor, public health nurse, dietitian, pharmacist or other professional responsible for maternal and child care. When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night. Never leave your baby alone during feeding.

name: Baby Nasal Aspirator NoseFrida The Snotsucker Plus Travel Case By Fridababy
description:
Product details
Baby Nasal Aspirator NoseFrida The Snotsucker By Fridababy

It's smart, It's Swedish, It's maybe a little strange. It's the doctor-invented nasal aspirator that actually works!
HYGIENIC: Disposable filters are clinically proven to prevent the transfer of mucus or bacterial germs to the snot sucker when clearing stuffy noses. Replace filter after every use.
COMFORTABLE + NON-INVASIVE: NoseFrida creates a seal with the outside of the baby’s nostril for gentle snotsucking.
DISHWASHER SAFE: The blue nasal tube, red mouthpiece, and filter cap are top-rack dishwasher safe for easy cleaning.
PEDIATRICIAN RECOMMENDED: BPA + Phthalate-free. Safe for all ages.
BABY REGISTRY ESSENTIAL: Includes 1 NoseFrida, 1 Travel Storage Case and 4 Hygiene Filters


  To Use
Place large tube ageist child's nostril (not inside), creating a seal. Use red mouthpiece to snuck out snot.

Tips:
Spraying saline solution in each nostril will help loosen thick mucus before using NoseFrida.
Move tube in a circular motion against nostril. You will hear and see mucus coming out of nose.
Change filter after each use to maintain suction.
Hazards and Cautions
Tube does not go inside the nose, so baby will not get injured if he/she moves. Only use NoseFrida for nasal aspiration - do not use in ears or throat. DO NOT BLOW air into red mouthpiece while tube is placed at child's nostril. NoseFrida is NOT a toy - keep all parts away from children. Never attach NoseFrida to a machine.

name: BaByliss The Crew Cut Hair Clipper
description:
Product details
BaByliss The Crew Cut

Easily cut your own hair with the specially designed self-clipper. With a precision engineered, twin blade cutting system, the BaByliss Crew Cut gives a backwards and forwards or side to side cutting action making it easy to maintain a short, all over, close cut. Powerful lithium-ion battery performance gives 75 minute cordless run time with sustained power even at lower charge levels.

Easy, close self-clipping
Lithium-ion battery for outstanding cordless performance
Advanced rapid charging system with 3 hour fast charge for 75 minute use or 30 minute quick charge for 15 minute use
Twin blade cutting system for easy, multidirectional use
4 comb guides for grades 1-4 and an ear taper guide.
Ultra-close 0.3mm result with no guide
Removable and washable blades

Accessories include: 4 x cutting guides, ear taper guide, travel pouch, cleaning brush and oil
How to use
Switch on the clipper using the on/off sliding switch located on top of the clipper. The blades will start to move and the green LED will illuminate.
Starting at the nape of the neck, hold the clipper with the teeth of the clipper pointing upwards and the comb guide flat on the head.
Slowlymove the clipper upwards, through the hair, and towards the front of the head in a forward sweeping motion.
Once at the front of the head, engage the opposite blade in a backward sweeping motion to move from the front of the head, back to the nape of the neck.
Continue with this sweeping motion, running from the nape of the neck to the front of the head until you reach an even length all over.
To tidy longer hairs around the ears and neckline, simply remove the comb guide and use the blade for neatening edges and shaping
sideburns.
Hazards and Cautions
- Always keep out of the reach of children. (During and after use and while cooling)
- Consumer Helpline : 03705 133 191

Our Unique Blend of Ingredients
With our blend of galacto- and fructo- oligosaccharides
To support normal cognitive development
Vitamin D for normal development of bones
Gluten free
No Added Salt
No Added Sugar

Preparation and Usage

Preparing your baby's feed:
Using a clean bowl and feeding spoon...
Mix 1 spoonful of cereal with...
2 spoonfuls of warm, previously boiled water and stir.
If serving warm, check temperature before feeding.
As your baby's appetite grows, use a larger spoon to make a bigger serving.
This is only a guide, if you want to alter the consistency, add more or less water as required. Let your little one's appetite lead the way.
Carefully observe your baby; they will let you know when they have had enough.

Breastfeeding is recommended for the first 6 months of life. Please speak with a healthcare professional before introducing solid foods.

Safety Warnings

Important
Do not leave your baby alone whilst feeding.
Remember to clean your baby's teeth, especially before bedtime.

Storage

Please store this product in a cool dry place (not in the fridge) and once opened use within 28 days.

name: Avène Very High Protection Cleanance Tinted SPF50 Sun Cream for Blemish-prone Skin 50ml
description:
Product details
Tinted daily ultra-fluid sun care for oily, blemish prone which offers UVB, UVA, Blue Light HEV sun protection for the most exposed area: the face.
This broad spectum SPF50+ high protection is water, sweat and sand resistant.  The non-sticky,  ultra light texture is easy to apply and is tinted on the face. Anti-blemish formula which limits the appearance of  scars , whilst keeping skin protected and hydrated for up to 8 hours*.  Formulated with our innovative and unique UVB, UVA and Blue Light HEV sunfilter Triasorb™, created after 20 years of Pierre Fabre research. UVB, UVA and  Blue Light from the sun has been proven to be harmful for the skin hence the need to be protected from it.
Ocean-friendly sunfilters respectful of marine biodiversity**
  * Comparison of the evolution of the hydration index (IH) of the product vs untreated control after single application, 21 subjects.
** Tested according to the European classification REACH and by the Oceanological Observatory in Banyuls -sur-Mer
Key Ingredients
- TriAsorB™: the first organic sun filter offering a broad spectrum protection against UVB, Short UVA, Long UVA, Blue Light (HEV). TriAsorB™ has been combined with 3 others sunfilters to create a new, 100% photostable* and ultra-efficient photoprotective system: Tinosorb S (UVB-UVA), Uvinul A+ (UVA) and Uvinul T150 (UVB).
- Avène Thermal Spring Water: unique; soothing, softening and anti-irritating active that leaves the skin feeling soft and comfortable
- Pre-tocopheryl: a powerful antioxidant, Vitamin E derivative.
*In vitro test, UVA and UVB spectra.
About Avène
Avène is a contemporary dermo-cosmetic skincare brand, recommended by healthcare professionals worldwide and is trusted by millions worldwide.  The thermal spring water source from which our products derive has been used to care for sensitive skin for over 270 years.
Dedicated to dermatology, Avène offers expert skincare products specially developed for sensitive skin. At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured.
Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin.
Suitable for
Oily, blemish‐prone skin
How to use
Before exposure to the sun, apply the product evenly onto the face. Re‐apply sunscreen  frequently, especially after swimming, sweating, towel drying or prolonged periods of sun exposure. Avoid exposure between noon and 4pm even while using a sunscreen product. Overexposure to the sun is dangerous. 
"}
Ingredients
AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA), C12-15 ALKYL BENZOATE, DIETHYLAMINO HYDROXYBENZOYL HEXYL BENZOATE, ETHYLHEXYL TRIAZONE, PHENYLENE BIS-DIPHENYLTRIAZINE, WATER (AQUA), GLYCERIN, BIS-ETHYLHEXYLOXYPHENOL METHOXYPHENYL TRIAZINE, TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891), POTASSIUM CETYL PHOSPHATE, ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) STARCH (ORYZA SATIVA STARCH), ISONONYL ISONONANOATE, GLYCERYL LAURATE, GLYCERYL STEARATE, STEARYL ALCOHOL, TAPIOCA STARCH, VP/EICOSENE COPOLYMER, ALUMINA, BENZOIC ACID, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL, FRAGRANCE (PARFUM), GLYCERYL BEHENATE, GLYCERYL DIBEHENATE, IRON OXIDES (CI 77492), IRON OXIDES (CI 77491), IRON OXIDES (CI 77499), ISOPROPYL MYRISTATE, ISOPROPYL TITANIUM TRIISOSTEARATE, POLYHYDROXYSTEARIC ACID, PPG-1-PEG-9 LAURYL GLYCOL ETHER, PROPYLENE CARBONATE, STEARALKONIUM HECTORITE, TOCOPHERYL GLUCOSIDE, TRIBEHENIN, XANTHAN GUM, ZINC GLUCONATE

name: Aptamil Comfort Baby Milk Formula Powder from Birth to 12 Months 800g
description:
Product details
This product must be used under medical supervision. If you think your baby has colic or constipation, speak to your healthcare professional for advice. Inspired by 40 years of research in early life science, our team have developed Aptamil Comfort Milk, nutritionally complete* and tailored for the dietary management of colic and constipation. Made with reduced lactose, partially hydrolysed protein and a fat blend with beta-palmitate. Aptamil Comfort Milk is suitable from birth to 12 months. Colic: if your baby has colic, they may experience intense and inconsolable crying episodes that last several hours, a flushed face, clenched fists and legs pulled up to the chest. National Health Service (NHS). Colic (online) 2022. Available at https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/colic. Constipation: constipation usually involves your baby passing abnormally delayed, infrequent, hard or dry stools, accompanied by pain and straining. National Health Service (NHS). Constipation in children (online) 2020. Available at https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/baby/health/constipation-in-children *suitable as the sole source of nutrition from birth to 6 months and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months to 1 year ** Galacto-oligosaccharides and Fructo-oliogosaccharides Aptamil is inspired by 40 years of research in early life science. Our team has developed Aptamil Comfort; nutritionally complete* and specifically tailored for the dietary management of colic and constipation. Our experts are here for you. Our team of baby feeding advisors are here to listen, and can offer personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting. Visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.
How to use
Food for special medical purposes
Ask for advice from your healthcare professional before use
Updated formulation to meet new legislation.

Feeding Guide
Aptamil® Comfort has a thicker texture than most other milks to help prevent your baby taking in too much air during feeding. We recommend using a variable flow teat or a single hole teat with a medium or fast flow.

Approx. age: Birth; Approx weight: 3.5kg: 7 3/4lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 3, Quantity of water per feed: 90ml, 3fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 6

Approx. age: 2 weeks; Approx weight: 3.9kg, 8 1/2lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 4, Quantity of water per feed: 120ml, 4fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 6

Approx. age: 2 months; Approx weight: 5kg, 11lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 6, Quantity of water per feed: 180ml, 6fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5

Approx. age: 4 months; Approx weight: 6.5kg, 14 1/2lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 7, Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5

Approx. age: 6 months; Approx weight: 7.5kg, 16 1/2lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 7, Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5

Approx. age: 7-12 months; Approx weight: -kg, -lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 7, Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 3

Assumes weaning at 6 months. Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.

Important:
Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop in this pack may change from the time to time. All babies are different, but it can take up to 2-3 weeks to notice a difference. If used for this time and you see no difference, we recommend you talk to your healthcare professional.

How to use this pack
To open, remove tamper evidence strip on the rim of the pack.

There is a handy leveller built into the pack. Store your scoop in the lid so that it is keep safe and secure.

Click the lid securely shut to keep your powder fresh.

Preparing your baby's feed

Because powdered milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill.

Wash hands and sterilise all utensils according to manufacturer's instructions.

Boil 1 litre of freshly run water. Leave kettle to cool for 30 minutes and no longer. Measure the required amount of water (refer to feeding guide) into a sterilised bottle. Be careful of scalding. Do not use artificially softened or repeatedly boiled water.

Using the scoop provided level off the powder with the built in leveller. Do not press/heap the powder.

Add the correct measure of powder to the water. Adding too many or too few scoops can be harmful. Place the sterilised teat and cap on the bottle and shake immediately, vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds, until the powder is dissolved.

Cool under running tap. Check temperature of feed. Feed immediately.


Due to the blend of ingredients in Aptamil® Comfort, the milk can separate once prepared. If this occurs, shake the bottle vigorously to mix and use as normal. You may notice that your baby's stools change consistency when using this formula, this is completely normal.

Important feeding and storage advice
Make up each feed as required.
For hygiene reasons, do not store made up feeds, discard unfinished feeds as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never add extra scoops or anything else to your baby's feed.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.
If necessary, offer cooled boiled water between feeds.

If your are concerned that your baby has colic or constipation you should speak to your healthcare professional.

Moving to the next stage
If you think your little one is ready to move on from Aptamil® Comfort, speak to a healthcare professional about the most suitable milk for your baby.
Hazards and Cautions
Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.

While every care has been taken to ensure this information is as accurate as possible, recipes and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice.

Important notice Breastfeeding is best for babies. Aptamil® Comfort is a food for special medical purposes for the dietary management of colic and constipation. It should only be used under medical supervision, after full consideration of the feeding options available including breastfeeding. Suitable for use as the sole source of nutrition for infants from birth and as part of a balanced diet from 6-12 months. For external use only. When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.Store powder in a cool, dry place. Do not refrigerate. Use powder within 4 weeks of opening.Ambient

name: BaByliss Hair Straightener Berry Crush
description:
Product details
The Berry Crush 230 hair straightener with slim design and smoothing quartz-ceramic plates glide effortlessly through the hair for a salon, sleek finish.  
The professional Advanced Ceramics™ heating system heats up quickly and maintains a high heat on every section for lasting results. 
The extra-long styling plates can straighten larger sections at one time for fast results.  Perfect for longer hair types.
Choose from 10 heat settings to suit your hair type and give enhanced heat protection.
Multi-voltage features delivers top performance wherever you are.
• Up to 230°C 
• Quartz-ceramic coated plates
• Advanced Ceramics™ heating system maintains high heat for consistent results
• 10 heat settings 140°C to 230°C
• Ready to use in 30 seconds
• Long-length styling plates for styling longer hair
• Multi-voltage for worldwide use
• Auto shut off
• 3m salon swivel cord
• Heat protection wrap
• 5 year guarantee
How to use
• Ensure hair is dry and combed through to remove any tangles. Divide the hair into sections ready for styling. • Turn the appliance on and rotate the temperature dial to select a heat setting suitable for your hair type. • Place a section of hair between the straightening plates, close to the roots. • Hold the hair firmly between the plates and slide down the length of the hair, from root to tip. • Repeat for each section of hair. • Allow the hair to cool before combing through. • Switch off and unplug the appliance. • Allow the appliance to cool before storing away.
Hazards and Cautions
• WARNING: Do not use this device in a bathtub, shower, or water-filled reservoir. Always keep out of the reach of children. (During and after use and while cooling) Consumer Helpline : 03705 133 191
Important info
