name: Babymoov 2 in1 Maternity Pillow Terracotta
description:
Product details
The unique 2in1 transforming maternity cushion from a U-shape to a C-shape for both pregnancy and feeding

As we know you need the very best, during your pregnancy as well as after the birth of your baby, Babymoov has designed a range of maternity pillows to meet all your needs

This collection has been really carefully thought-out with silent microbeads, super soft organic fabrics, and OEKO-TEX certification. Everything is designed to encourage relaxation and provide you with unrivalled comfort.

• Unique and innovative: U-shape pregnancy pillow converts into a C-shape feeding pillow
• Soft and adjustable for maximum comfort
• Covers made from super soft organic cotton, GOTS-certified (Global Organic Textile Standard)
• Made in Europe
• Very fine, Toxproof-certified (non-toxic) microbeads make it silent and lightweight
• Comes packed beautifully in a reusable recycled plastic bag
• Refillable (bag of microbeads sold separately)

The B. LOVE 2-in-1 pillow is a revolutionary patented innovation for parents-to-be Ultra soft with silent microbead filling, this organic cotton pillow is super comfortable. Its ingenious, user-friendly bead transferral system means you can now have 2 pillows in 1 for made-to-measure relaxation during pregnancy and feeding baby.

Comes first as a larger U-shape soft bolster pillow, perfect for supporting the back, legs and tummy during pregnancy. 

It can then be converted into a practical compact C-shape pillow for breastfeeding or bottle-feeding your baby at exactly the right height, or to provide added comfort when sat on the sofa or when travelling. Simply open the discreet zip fastening on the top, remove the cover and turn it inside out whilst evenly distributing the filling. See images/video for how it works! It only takes 30 seconds.

This 2-in-1 pillow means there's no need to buy a maternity and breastfeeding cushion, as you have both within easy reach. Plus points: as well as saving space and time, most importantly it contains extremely fine, silent and non-toxic microbeads (Toxproof-certified) so there's no compromise on comfort.

The B. LOVE range brings you unrivalled comfort with a super soft and stretchy organic cotton cover. Whether you are sitting or lying down, in bed or out and about, the pillow moulds to your body shape to create a cosy space and subtle support to reduce the impact of aches and pains. Two covers are included to fit the desired shape, ideal for keeping it clean.

Here at Babymoov, we love products that last a lifetime. That's why you can continue to use your pillow even when your baby is older, for reading or chilling out Plus, the pillow has a secure zip fastening so it can be refilled with microbeads.
To take care of future generations, we are gradually changing our manufacturing methods as well as working together to embrace more environmentally-friendly practices:

- The 2-in-1 pillow is made in Europe, therefore minimising our manufacturing carbon footprint
- As a hallmark of environmental responsibility, the pillow carries Oeko-Tex (R) certification to guarantee the materials used are high quality and non-toxic for your baby
- The outer covers made from super soft organic cotton are GOTS-certified (Global Organic Textile Standard)
- Toxproof-certified (non-toxic) microbeads make it silent and lightweight
- Comes in an eco-friendly reusable recycled plastic bag

• Cover: 95% Organic Cotton, 5% Elastane
• Inner cover: 97% Polyester, 3% Elastane
• Filling: expanded polystyrene microbeads
• Care: Cover is machine washable at 30°C
• Pillow is hand wash only
• Not suitable for the tumble dryer
• Dimensions: U shape: unfolded: 175 cm / folded: 75 x 40 x 15 cm
C shape: unfolded: 160 cm / folded: 50 x 40 x 15 cm

WARNING. Do not leave the child unattended

name: Aptamil Lactose Free Baby Milk 400g
description:
Product details
IMPORTANT NOTICE: Breastfeeding is best. Infant milk is suitable from birth, when babies are not breastfed and should only be used on the advice of a doctor, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care. Inspired by 50 years of research in early life science, Aptamil® Lactose Free Infant Milk is not suitable for infants with galactosaemia or cow’s milk protein allergy. If you are concerned that your baby needs a lactose free infant milk, speak to your healthcare professional. Aptamil® Lactose Free First Infant Milk is a Nutritionally Complete Infant Formula*, suitable as a sole source of nutrition from birth and as part of a weaning diet from 6 to 12 months. *As required by the legislation for all infant formula.
How to use
To Serve
Preparing your baby's feed. Because powdered milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions, may make your baby ill. Wash hands and sterilise all utensils according to manufacturers' instructions. Boil 1 litre of fresh water. Leave kettle to cool for no longer than 30 mins. Measure the required amount of water into a sterilised bottle. Be careful of scalding. Do not use artificially softened or repeatedly boiled water. Using the scoop provided level off the powder with a clean knife. Do not press/heap the powder. Add the correct measure of powder to the water. Adding too many or too few scoops can be harmful. Cap the bottle and shake vigorously for 25 seconds to dissolve the powder. Remove cap and replace with a sterilised teat. Cool under running tap. Check temperature of feed. Feed immediately

Important: Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop may change from time to time. Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop may change from time to time. Do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed night.

Make up each feed as required. For hygiene reasons, do not store made up feeds and always discard unfinished feeds as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours. Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.

Feeding guide 0-12 months
Approx. age: Birth; Approx. weight: 3.5kg, 7.5lb; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 6; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.3g): 3; Quantity of water per feed: 90ml, 3fl oz
Approx. age: 2 weeks; Approx. weight: 4.0kg, 8.8lb; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 6; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.3g): 4; Quantity of water per feed: 120ml, 4fl oz
Approx. age: 2 mths; Approx. weight: 5.0kg, 11.0lb; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.3g): 6; Quantity of water per feed: 180ml, 6fl oz
Approx. age: 4 mths; Approx. weight: 6.5kg, 14.5lb; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.3g): 7; Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7fl oz
Approx. age: 6 mths*; Approx. weight: 7.5kg, 16.5lb; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 4; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.3g): 8; Quantity of water per feed: 240ml, 8fl oz
Approx. age: 7-12 mths; Approx. weight: -kg, -lb; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 3; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.3g): 7; Quantity of water per feed: 210ml, 7fl oz

*Assumes weaning at 6 months. Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is given as a guide only as each baby is an individual.

Storage
Store in a cool dry place. Do not refrigerate. Use powder within 4 weeks of opening.
Hazards and Cautions
Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.

While every care has been taken to ensure this information is as accurate as possible, recipes and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice.

Aptamil Lactose Free is a food for special medical purposes. It should only be used under medical supervision, after full consideration of the feeding options available including breastfeeding. Suitable for use as the sole source of nutrition for infants from birth and as part of a balanced diet from 6-12 months. Not suitable for parenteral use. This formula is not suitable for infants who have cows' milk allergy.

Important: Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop may change from time to time. Do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.

name: BaByliss Titanium Brilliance Curls Tong 32mm
description:
Product details
Designed to create soft, tumbling curls, the Titanium Brilliance Curls Tong has a 32mm super-polished titanium barrel with a spring-activated lever to gently hold your hair in place as you style for effortless results. The long length barrel and ultra-fast heat transfer give flawlessly smooth, loose curls that last, even on longer hair types.

6 digital heat settings up to 210°C offer enhanced heat protection and precise heat control. The Advanced Ceramics™ heating system ensures super-fast heat up and maintains high heat as you style for beautiful, lasting curls.

Loose curls
Large 32mm barrel with easy to use lever, softly holds the hair for effortless styling

Professional styling
Salon-grade Advanced Ceramics™ heating system gives super-fast heat up and maintains high heat on every section for fast results

Fast results
Super polished true-titanium barrel gives fast-action heat transfer for easy styling and lasting curls

Precise Heat control
6 Digital temperature settings from 160°C - 210°C for enhanced heat protection. Suitable on all hair types
How to use
Comb through dry hair and divide into sections.
Turn on the appliance and select a heat setting suitable for your hair type.
Press the lever and place the appliance midway up a section of hair and spread the hair evenly between the lever and barrel.
Once the hair is in place, carefully release the lever, securing the hair between the lever and the barrel. Gently slide the appliance down to the end of the hair and wind the hair around the barrel.
Hold in place for 5-8 seconds, then press the lever and pull the appliance away.
Repeat for each section of hair.
Allow the hair to cool before styling.
After use, switch off and unplug the appliance.
Allow to cool before storing the appliance away.
Hazards and Cautions
WARNING: Do not use this device in a bathtub, shower, or water-filled reservoir. Always keep out of the reach of children. (During and after use and while cooling) Consumer Helpline : 03705 133 191

The highly-pigmented, chip resistant formula gives a gel-like finish and comes in a range of colour-popping hues.

name: Avène Micellar Gel 200ml
description:
Product details
This refreshing make-up removing micellar gel cleanses (even pollution particles*), hydrates** and soothes sensitive faces and eyes in one easy step. It contains 99% ingredients of natural origin and none of animal origin. This gel hydrates and soothes thanks to its refreshing, smooth texture. Comfortable for the skin and delicately fragranced, it removes make-up and provides comfort in one simple and quick step. It improves hydration and preserves the skin's natural balance thanks to the combination of Glycerin and Trehalose, and the high concentration of Avène Thermal Spring Water with its soothing properties. Its formula contains just the right amount of naturally-derived ingredients for very good tolerance***. Leaves skin clear, soft, soothed and comfortable. Suitable for contact lens wearers. 
The 200 mL Make-up removing micellar gel packaging is made of 45% recycled materials. The packaging is recyclable.
*  Assessment of the quantity of microparticles remaining after a single application conducted on 27 subjects
**Upper skin layers. Kinetic study on hydration up to 6h after a single application, conducted on 23 subjects
*** Monocenter study conducted on 33 subjects with sensitive skin and eyes, applied twice daily on the face, eyes, lips and dÉcolletÉ
About Avene
Avene is a contemporary dermo-cosmetic skincare brand, recommended by healthcare professionals worldwide and is trusted by millions worldwide.  The thermal spring water source from which our products derive has been used to care for sensitive skin for over 270 years.
Dedicated to dermatology, Avene offers expert skincare products specially developed for sensitive skin. At the heart of every Avène product is the uniquely composed Avène Thermal Spring Water, a natural soothing source clinically shown by over 150 studies to soothe, soften and calm the skin. Avène Thermal Spring Water begins its journey when it falls as rain over the Cevennes Mountains, filtering down through the soil and rocks for over 40 years before bubbling up, pure and clear, to the surface at the Sainte-Odile spring. We direct the water straight from the source to the production plant where Eau Thermale Avène products are manufactured.
Avène offers ranges suitable for any skin concern: very sensitive skin, dehydrated, oily and blemish-prone, anti-ageing, sun-protection, dull skin, dry skin, redness-prone, and itchy skin."
Suitable for
Sensitive skin and eyes
How to use
Apply using a cotton pad.
No-rinse. 
Ingredients
AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). PENTYLENE GLYCOL. WATER (AQUA). CITRIC ACID. DISODIUM COCO-GLUCOSIDE CITRATE. FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). GLYCERIN. POLYGLYCERYL-4 CAPRATE. POLYGLYCERYL-6 CAPRYLATE. SCLEROTIUM GUM. TREHALOSE. TRISODIUM ETHYLENEDIAMINE DISUCCINATE. XANTHAN GUM

name: Babymoov Cosyhead Fresh Smokey
description:
Product details
Cosyhead Fresh, the head support that helps reduce flat head syndrome to ensure proper development!

Co-developed with a French paediatrician, this unique head support is specially designed to respect your baby's morphology. It provides an optimal position that prevents plagiocephaly and maintains your baby's head perfectly round, ensuring pressure distribution on the baby's skull.

This pillow is made of certified organic cotton OCS and Tencel (TM), providing unparalleled comfort.

The Cosyhead Fresh is made of Lyocell-Tencel®, a naturally ultra-soft and breathable material that ensures good ventilation of the head and neck to limit baby's sweating.

Versatile and practical, this head support can be used from birth in various environments, whether in a bouncer, carrycot, stroller, etc. Its portable and compact design allows you to take it with you everywhere, providing your baby with the same comfort wherever you go.

Featuring a non-slip back for better grip, the Cosyhead Fresh is recommended for use up until your baby is 3 months old or able to roll over unaided.

Made in Europe, this pillow offers your infant a healthy, comfortable and non restrictive support for proper development.
Hazards and Cautions
IMPORTANT! Read carefully and keep for future reference.
WARNING
∙ Stop using the product once your baby is 3 months old, or starts to roll over
unaided, or is too big to fit into it properly. RISK OF SUFFOCATION.
∙ Do not use pillows, blankets or additional padding underneath or beside the
infant. RISK OF SUFFOCATION.
∙ Do not use this product in an adult bed. RISK OF SUFFOCATION.
∙ Do not use this product at height. RISK OF FALLING.
∙ Remove the child before moving the product.
∙ Beware of the danger of placing the cot near naked flames and other sources of
intense heat such as gas or electric heaters, etc.
∙ Stop using the product once the child starts moving around, and wanting to
turn over. This is because the child’s movements may cause them to roll off the
product and onto their side, or end up with their face against the mattress in
a position where they cannot breathe. Medical opinion states that babies gain
this ability to move at around 3 months, but users should be reminded of the
importance of pre-empting this and looking out for their child gaining these
new skills.
∙ Using the product beyond the age indicated can have serious consequences
for the child.
∙ Check that all parts of the product are correctly assembled before use.
∙ Do not use the product if any components are broken or missing.
∙ Right from birth, place your baby on their back, fl at, in their own cot with a fi rm
mattress. Never place them on their tummy or side.
∙ Up to the age of 6 months, parents are recommended to sleep in the same room
as their baby, placing the cot next to their bed. It is recommended to place your
baby in their cot on their own, on a fi rm mattress the same size as the cot. No
items should be placed in their cot: no cot bumpers, blankets, duvets, pillows,
toys or soft toys.
∙ Ensure that the child’s chin does not rest on their chest by ensuring that two
adult fingers can fit in the space between the chin and the torso, so that their
breathing is not impeded.
∙ Take into account the temperature of the room and the nightwear worn by the
child, and ensure that the child is neither too hot nor too cold; excessive heat
can endanger the life of your child. A temperature of 19 °C is recommended. The
air in the bedroom must not be too humid or too dry, and the room should be
ventilated every day to provide fresh air.
∙ The item should be washed prior to first use according to
the manufacturer’s instructions.
Important info

name: Babyway 3 in 1 Baby Carrier
description:
Product details
Babyway 3 in 1 Baby Carrier

Parents will love this Carrier for its host of features as well as its simple design. It offers three carry positions, taking you from cradling your newborn to leisurely walks out with your toddler. The carrier can be used with babies from birth with weight range of 3.5kg to a maximum12kg.

It includes padded shoulder straps and lumbar support, cushioned leg openings and a back strap to help spread baby’s weight, so it can be used with comfort and ease. The padded seat and internal support promote baby’s natural spread squat in all positions, aiding their hip and spine development.

Breathable cool mesh fabric helps to keep baby cool and reduce sweating during the summer months. There’re also hi-visibility reflective strips running the height of the carrier at both sides to increase low light visibility when on for those Autumn / Winter strolls or even crossing the road.

Front Facing Position - From birth, in the front-facing position, your baby benefits from close contact and interaction with you.

Outward Facing Position - When they’re around three months old or can hold up their own head, the outward facing position (with the adjustable head cushion removed and neck support folded over) lets them explore the world around them.

Back Carrying Position - When your little once is feeling more confident, you can convert to the back carrying position.
Hazards and Cautions
The babyway 3 in 1 baby carrier is suitable for babies from birth with a weight of 3.5kg to 12kg.

Your child must face towards you until he or she can hold their head upright (about 4 to 5 months old).

Hold your baby closely at all times until the buckles are correctly attached.

Make sure your baby is properly positioned with their legs straddling the seat.

Check all buckles and adjustments are secure before each use.

Pull all straps closely around you.Always make sure there is enough room around baby’s nose and mouth to provide clear air.Never lie down with your baby in the baby carrier.

Inspect the baby carrier regularly for any signs of wear and tear.

Your child MUST be able to sit upright unassisted to use the backpack position (about 6 months old).

Small children can fall through a leg opening. Adjust leg openings to fit baby’s legs snugly.

Care instructions can be found on the label on the baby carrier.

NEVER leave your child in the carrier unless it is being worn, as your child may suffocate or fall.

DO NOT use in exercise activities or motorised vehicles.

DO NOT bend over at your waist; bend at the knees. To be carried by adults while standing or walking only.

DISCONTINUE use if damaged, broken or parts are missing.

Check REGULARLY that your child is secure, comfortable, that their face is uncovered and that they are breathing freely.

For low birthweight babies and children with medical conditions, seek advice from a health professional before using this product.
Important info
Country of Origin: Ireland

name: Aptamil Advanced 2 Follow On Baby Milk Formula Liquid 6-12 Months 200ml
description:
Product details
Aptamil Profutura is now Aptamil Advanced Follow Milk

Ready to Drink

UHT sterilised


Our Most Advanced Formulation* to Complement a Weaning Diet
*Contains iron to support normal cognitive development
Suitable for
Suitable for Babies aged 6-12 Months*.

*Breastfeeding is best.
How to use
Preparation & Usage

Preparation and feeding guide:
Because powdered milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill.
Approx. age: Up to 2 weeks; Approx weight: 3.5kg, 7 3/4lb; Single feed: 90ml, 3fl oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 6
Approx. age: 2-4 weeks; Approx weight: 3.9kg, 8 1/2lb; Single feed: 120ml, 4fl oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 4-8 weeks; Approx weight: 4.7kg, 10 1/2lb; Single feed: 150ml, 5fl oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 8-12 weeks; Approx weight: 5.4kg, 12lb; Single feed: 180ml, 6fl oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 3-4 months; Approx weight: 6.2kg, 13 3/4lb; Single feed: 180ml, 6fl oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 4-5 months; Approx weight: 6.9kg, 15 1/4lb; Single feed: 210ml, 7fl oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 5-6 months; Approx weight: 7.6kg, 16 3/4lb; Single feed: 210ml, 7fl oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 7-12 months; Approx weight: -kg, -lb; Single feed: 210ml, 7fl oz; No. of feeds per 24 hours: 3

Assumes weaning at 6 months. Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.Please follow these instructions carefully. Failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill.

1. Wash hands and sterilise all utensils according to manufacturers' instructions.
2. Shake bottle well. Pour the required amount of milk into a sterilised feeding bottle.
3. Serve at room temperature, or warmed if desired. If warmed, check temperature of feed.

Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.Never leave your baby alone during feeding.

Storage:
1. For hygiene reasons, discard unfinished milk in the feeding bottle as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
2. Any unused milk in this 200ml bottle can be stored by replacing the cap, storing upright in a refrigerator and used within 24 hours.
3. Store unopened bottles in a cool, dry place.
Hazards and Cautions
Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.

While every care has been taken to ensure this information is as accurate as possible, recipes and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice.

Important information: Breastfeeding is best Follow On Milk is only for babies over 6 months, as part of a mixed diet.It should not be used as a breastmilk substitute before 6 months. The decision to start weaning including the use of this product before 6 months should be made only on the advice of a doctor, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care, based on baby’s individual needs.

When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby’s teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby’s teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night

name: Aptamil 3 Toddler Milk 1-3 years 200ml
description:
Product details
Designed to support your toddler’s changing nutritional needs, our ready to drink Aptamil Toddler Milk is:

Made with Omega-3 and our blend of Galacto and Fructo-oligosaccharides (GOS/FOS)

A source of Iron to support normal cognitive development

Contains calcium, and vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system

Ready to drink

Contains no artificial preservatives* and made with a palm oil free oil blend


Your baby’s first birthday is just the beginning of many future firsts. Between the ages of 1 - 3, your baby’s nutritional needs are changing as they experience their most rapid period of development. Inspired by 50 years of early life nutrition research, and tailored specifically to complement your toddler's changing nutritional needs, just two x 150ml beakers of Aptamil Toddler formula milk provides 100% of the recommended daily amount of vitamin D for toddlers**. Made with our unique blend of GOS/FOS***, Omega-3, calcium and vitamins A and C, Aptamil Toddler milk also contains iron to support normal cognitive development. Our 200ml cartons of Toddler Milk comes in ready to drink format and are easy to carry for when you’re on the go. *As required by the legislation **As recommended for toddlers by the Department of Health (UK)/Food Safety Authority of Ireland ***A blend of Galacto- and Fructo-oligosaccharides Brand story: The beginning of your baby’s life is a special and beautiful time, and we know just how important it is that your baby gets the nutrition they need at every stage of their development. Inspired by 50 years of early life nutrition research, our passionate team of scientists have brought together our blend of ingredients and unique process to support your baby on their feeding journey. Trust us to support your unique experience at every step, from birth to toddlerhood.

Features
Excellent source of vitamin D
With Pronutra†
Our unique blend of ingredients
Tailored to toddlers' nutritional needs
Ready to useUHT sterilised
Low sodium
Gluten free
Growing up milk

Our midwives, nutritionists and feeding advisors are always on hand to talk about feeding your baby. For personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting, please visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.
How to use
To Serve
Your toddler will need about 2 x 150ml beakers of Aptamil Growing Up milk a day, as part of a balanced diet. Aptamil Growing Up milk is specially formulated to help meet the increased nutritional needs of toddlers from 1 year onwards.

Shake the carton of Aptamil Growing Up milk before opening. Pour the required amount of milk into a clean beaker. Aptamil Growing Up milk can be given at room temperature or warmed if desired. If warmed, check temperature of drink. For hygiene reasons, discard unfinished milk in the beaker as soon as possible and always within 2 hours.

Do not heat drinks in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding. Toddlers should be supervised at all times when feeding. Once opened, unused Growing Up milk still in this carton must be refrigerated immediately and used within 72 hours. Do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of drinks with your toddler's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay, ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice.

Storage
Once opened, unused Growing Up milk still in this carton must be refrigerated immediately and used within 72 hours.

Assumes weaning at 6 months. Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.

Please follow these instructions carefully. Failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill.
Wash hands and sterilise all utensils according to manufacturers' instructions.

Shake bottle well. Pour the required amount of milk into a sterilised feeding bottle.

Serve at room temperature, or warmed if desired. If warmed, check temperature of feed. Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding. Never leave your baby alone during feeding.


Storage
Store unopened bottles in a cool, dry place.

Important notice
Breastfeeding is best for babies. Aptamil® First Infant Milk should only be used on the advice of a doctor, midwife, health visitor, public health nurse, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care.

When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.

Safety Warning
For hygiene reasons, discard unfinished milk in the feeding bottle as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.Any unused milk in this 200ml bottle can be stored by replacing the cap, storing upright in a refrigerator and used within 24 hours.

name: Aptamil 3 Toddler Milk 1-3 years 1L
description:
Product details
Designed to support your toddler’s increased nutritional needs our ready to drink Aptamil Toddler Milk is:

● Made with Omega-3 and our blend of Galacto and Fructo-oligosaccharides (GOS/FOS)
● A source of Iron to support normal cognitive development
● Contains calcium, and vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system
● Ready to drink
● Contains no artificial preservatives* and made with a palm oil free oil blend

Your baby’s first birthday is just the beginning of many future firsts. Between the ages of 1 - 3, your baby’s nutritional needs are increasing as they experience their most rapid period of development. Inspired by 50 years of early life nutrition research and tailored specifically to complement your toddler's changing nutritional needs, just two x 150ml beakers of Aptamil Toddler formula milk provides 100% of the recommended daily amount of vitamin D for toddlers**. Made with our unique blend of GOS/FOS***, Omega-3, calcium and vitamins A and C, Aptamil Toddler Milk also contains iron to support normal cognitive development. Our 1L cartons of Aptamil Growing Up Milk come ready to drink. *As required by the legislation **As recommended for toddlers by the Department of Health (UK)/Food Safety Authority of Ireland ***A blend of Galacto- and Fructo-oligosaccharides The beginning of your baby’s life is a special and beautiful time, and we know just how important it is that your baby gets the nutrition they need at every stage of their development. Inspired by 50 years of early life nutrition research, our passionate team of scientists have brought together our patented blend of ingredients and unique process to support your baby on their feeding journey. Trust us to support your unique experience at every step, from birth to toddlerhood.

Our midwives, nutritionists and feeding advisors are always on hand to talk about feeding your baby. For personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting, please visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.
How to use
To Serve Your toddler will need about 2 x 150ml beakers of Aptamil Growing Up milk a day, as part of a balanced diet. Aptamil Growing Up milk is specially formulated to help meet the increased nutritional needs of toddlers from 1 year onwards. Preparing your toddler's drink. Shake the carton of Aptamil Growing Up milk before opening. Pour the required amount of milk into a clean beaker. Aptamil Growing Up milk can be given at room temperature or warmed if desired. If warmed, check temperature of drink. For hygiene reasons, discard unfinished milk in the beaker as soon as possible and always within 2 hours. Do not heat drinks in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding. Toddlers should be supervised at all times when feeding. Do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of drinks with your toddler's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Storage Once opened, unused Growing Up milk still in this carton must be refrigerated immediately and used within 72 hours. Best Before: see top of carton.
Hazards and Cautions
Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.

description:
Product details
Very high sun protection, 100% mineral, fluid and light texture for skin most intolerant to chemical filters and fragrances.

DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS.
Key benefits:
PHOTOPROTECTION: photostable UVB-UVA filters that fight against the harmful effects of the sun's rays.

100% MINERAL

ANTIOXIDANT: helps protect cells against free radicals.

FRAGRANCE-FREE: for greater respect for sensitive or intolerant skin.

NO WHITE FILM: for a natural complexion and invisible protection.

VERY WATER-RESISTANT.


Discover Avène’s sensitive skincare regime:
STEP1: Cleanse using Avène Tolerance Extremely Gentle Cleanser.
STEP2: Moisturise using Avène Tolerance Control Soothing Skin Recovery Cream.
STEP3: Protect using Avène Mineral Fluid SPF50+.

Always prep your skin with Avène Thermal Spring Water to refresh, calm and soften the skin.

More information on our brand:
ROOTED IN DERMATOLOGY AND HYDROTHERAPY
Avène has over 275 years of expertise in caring for sensitive skin and is recommended by dermatologists worldwide. At the heart of every formula, is clinically proven Avêne Thermal Spring Water to soothe, soften and calm the skin.
In Avène, a small village in the southwest of France that hugs the banks of the Orb River, flows a thermal spring - the source of unique, pure water with remarkable soothing and calming properties.
AVÈNE'S MISSION, PURPOSE & VALUES
Dedicated to sensitive skin and improving quality of life for all skin types, leveraging pharmaceutical and dermatological heritage and expertise.
Suitable for
Very sensitive, reactive, intolerant skin.

Before exposure to the sun, apply the product evenly onto the skin. Re‐apply sunscreen frequently, especially after swimming or prolonged periods of exposure.

name: Babymoov Swoon Evolution 8 - Motion Baby Swing
description:
Product details
Multi-motion electric baby swing chair with 8 unique movements + 360° baby chair
8 unique ultra-smooth movements
360° seat rotation system
Seat can be adjusted to 5 positions: backrest (2 positions) and seat (3 positions) can be adjusted separately using one hand
Stylish, modern swing design featuring beautiful  boucle knit fabric baby chair
Programmable swing time (10, 20 or 30 minutes)
Remote control included for setting the rocking, speed, timer and sound
Play arch with 3 sensory early learning toys, adjustable to 3 position
12 lullabies with adjustable volume
Newborn insert and cover can be removed and machine-washed
5-point harness
Mains power adapter included
Swing can be dismantled for ease of transport
Lifetime warranty included


The Swoon Evolution combines 8 ultra-smooth swing movements with 5 speeds to mimic the soothing sensation of being in a parent's arms.*

Its innovative 360° rotating seat system means your baby can be at the perfect interactive level and direction to engage with family life without having to move the swing itself. It has 5 seat reclining positions for rest and play which are easily adjustable with one hand to suit your baby. Its secure 5-point harness means your baby is completely safe in the chair from birth.


Featuring 12 tunes (lullabies, white noise and sounds of nature). Swoon Evolution operates with a remote control so you can set the swing function, speed, timer and lullabies remotely. All functions are also changable on the touchscreen control pad on the base of the swing.


Shop Swoon Evolution with Lifetime Warranty
Because the action we take today shapes the future of our children, Babymoov ensures this product carries a lifetime warranty Choosing Babymoov products with a Lifetime Warranty means you are choosing sustainability. They can also be repaired if you run into any problem to extend their lifespan. Our customer service team are always on-hand to help. Contact us by clicking on the 'help' button in the right hand corner of the screen at babymoov.co.uk


Composition: Newborn insert: outer 75% Polyester, 25% Cotton / Filling: 100% Polyester / Back: 98% Polyester, 2% Elastane / Cover: 100% Polyester / Toys: 100% Polyester
Care: cushion machine-washable at 30°C / Cover machine-washable (ultra gentle/hand wash cycle, no spin) We recommend using a protective laundry net
Power supply: mains operated (2.5 m adapter included)
Seat dimensions: L.81 x W.65 x H.79 cm
Footprint: 69 x63cm 
Suitable for
0-9kg
Hazards and Cautions
• Do not use this product once your child can sit up unaided or
weighs more than 9 kg.
• To avoid injury ensure that children are kept away when unfolding
and folding this product.
• Do not let children play with this product.
• The infant swing shall ony be used with the recommended
transformer (not included).
• Do not use any other type of adapter, as this could damage the
swing and result in injury.
• IMPORTANT: before any operation make sure your cradle swing
is switched off. The cradle swing can work off the mains by means
of the adapter (not included).
• Insert the adapter (not included) plug in the socket designed for
the purpose and the other end in the mains socket.
• Power supply units used with the swing for children should be
monitored regularly in order to detect damage to the wire, the
socket, the box and other parts. Do not use the power supply
unit if damaged.
• Never leave the child unattended.
• Stop using the product when the child starts trying to
sit up.
• Never use this product on an elevated surface
(e.g. a table).
• Always use the restraint system.
• Never use the toy bar to carry the product.
• Do not move or lift this product with the baby inside it. • Never leave the child sleep in this product. This product does not
replace a baby basket or cot. If your child needs to sleep, he should
be placed in a suitable basket or cot.
• Do not use the product if any components are broken or missing.
• Do not use replacement parts other than those approved by the
manufacturer or distributor.
Remote control battery
• Non-rechargeable batteries must not be recharged.
• Do not mix different types of batteries, or new and old batteries.
• Insert the batteries according to the polarity indicated.
• Remove exhausted batteries from the product.
• Do not short-circuit the battery terminals.
• Keep the batteries out of the reach of children.
• Change the batteries when the cradle swing stops
working satisfactorily.
• Remove the batteries before storing your cradle swing for
a long period.
• Use the container for the purpose to throw the batteries away
• Replace and recharge all the batteries at the same time.
• The rechargeable batteries must be charged under the supervision
of an adult.
• Do not recharge a rechargeable battery in a different charger.
• Do not throw the batteries on the fire as they might burst or give
off noxious fumes.
• Batteries, accumulators, or rechargeable batteries are not ordinary
domestic waste. They contain a large number of pollutants and
dangerous materials; in addition, recycling them enables raw
materials to be recovered that can be used for making new objects
without exploiting natural resources! This is why they must be thrown
away in compliance with a special collection and recycling cycle.
• WARNING: this product contains a coin/button battery. A coin/button battery can cause serious internal chemical
burns if swallowed.
• WARNING: dispose of used batteries immediately. Keep new and used batteries away from children. If you think
batteries may have been swallowed or placed inside any
part of the body, seek immediate medical attention. • Electric equipment is subject to a selective collection procedure.
Do not throw away electrical and electronic equipment waste with
the unsorted municipal refuse, but carry out a selective collection.
• Throughout the European Union this symbol indicates this
product must not be thrown in the dustbin or mixed with
domestic waste but undergo selective collection.

description:
Product details
The Badabulle anti-uv pop up beach tent with 50+ UPF protection for babies and toddlers

• Maximum 50+ protection
• Large size when unfolded (L.125 x W.100 x H.85 cm) and space saving when folded away (42 cm in diameter)
• Pop-up system: easy to unfold and fold away 
• 4 pegs for fixing to the ground 
• Central opening and mesh on the sides for excellent ventilation

In the garden, on the beach or in the park, for playing or napping, the Badabulle anti-UV tent protects your baby from the sun as well as wind and sand. Highly practical, the tent opens up and folds down in just a few seconds with its pop-up system. Once opened, you can fix it to the ground using the four pegs provided to keep it firmly in place.

Safari atmosphere with this tent with adventure patterns: giraffe, vegetation, wild river, something to inspire our mini-adventurers!
Suitable for
0+
Hazards and Cautions
IMPORTANT SAFETY INFORMATION
This product pops open when removed from its
packaging or bag. Take care when removing it.
• The tent must be assembled by an adult. Once
removed from its bag, the « anti-UV tent » may
pop open violently. Never allow a child to fold
or unfold the « anti-UV tent » without adult
supervision.
• Always store the ten in its bag after use.
• The « anti-UV tent » must not be used as shelter
during storms.
• The tent must be placed on a level surface free of
obstructions, such as pebbles or sharp objects.
• Never place heavy objects in the tent.
• Dispose of this product immediately if its poles
break or fold.
• Remove all packaging before giving to children.
• Never leave your child unattended even for a
short time.
• Avoid the hottest hours between noon and 4PM.
• For optimal protection, ensure your child drinks
regularly, use baby sunscreen, a T-shirt, a cap
and shorts.
• Never leave your baby in the « anti-UV tent » for
more than 45 minutes at a time.
ATTENTION
Keep tent fabric away from open flames and
sources of heat. The tent is made of heat resistant
fabric. However, it is not fireproof. The fabric will
burn if it remains in constant contact with any heat
source (e.g. radiator).
MAINTENANCE
Not machine washable.
Wipe clean with a clean damp cloth.

description:
Product details
The U-shape micro-bead maternity pillow with button fastening for feeding

• Adaptable: can be used during pregnancy and after birth for feeding
• Soft and adjustable for maximum comfort
• The cover is made from super-soft organic cotton, GOTS-certified (Global Organic Textile Standard)
• Made in Europe
• Very fine, Toxproof-certified (non-toxic) microbeads make it silent and lightweight
• Ingenious fastening system 
• Comes beautifully packed in a reusable recycled plastic bag
• Refillable (bag of microbeads sold separately)

The B. LOVE organic cotton maternity pillow is supportive and relaxing. Enjoy unrivalled comfort whilst bonding with your baby thanks to extremly fine, silent microbeads.

This pillow is designed to soothe any pregnancy-related aches and pains (backache, lumbar pain, tightness in the lower abdomen, heavy legs, etc.). It fits around you whatever position you are in with its ergonomic shape and ultra fine microbeads. B. LOVE pillow also brings you unrivalled comfort with its super soft and stretchy organic cotton cover. 

Whether you are sitting or lying down, in bed or on the sofa, the pillow moulds to your body shape giving a memory foam-like feeling. You can even use it in your pre-natal yoga class, open or closed using its fastening system. 

Once you've brought baby home, this adaptable pillow takes on a whole new purpose. Use for easier breastfeeding or bottle-feeding. Its slightly sloped shape means you will always be at the right height and in a comfortable position, whilst its thinner ends are great for propping comfortably against your back. 
A button fastening system holds the pillow in place and leaves your hands free for feeding your baby.

Here at Babymoov, we love products that last a lifetime. That's why you can use your pillow for reading or chilling out or as a support cushion for baby when they sit for the first time. Plus, the pillow has a secure zip fastening so it can be refilled with microbeads.

Inspired by nature, this cushion features subtle, feather-light motifs to add a romantic feel to your home.

To take care of future generations, we are gradually changing our manufacturing methods as well as working together to embrace more environmentally-friendly practices:

- The B.Love maternity pillow is made in Europe, reducing our manufacturing carbon footprint

- As a hallmark of environmental responsibility, the pillow carries Oeko-Tex (R) certification to guarantee the materials used are high quality and non-toxic for your baby

- The outer cover is made from super soft organic cotton, GOTS-certified (Global Organic Textile Standard)

 - Toxproof-certified (non-toxic) microbeads make it silent and lightweight

Product details
Powerful 2300W hairdryer featuring a salon-grade AC motor that delivers ultra-fast drying results. The diamond lustre technology combines diamond infused ceramics and active super- ionic conditioners to tame frizz as you dry, smoothing the hair cuticles for ultimate shiny results.

Perfectly balanced and lightweight with variable heat and speed settings for total control plus a cold shot to set your style for long-lasting style. The slim concentrator nozzle is perfect for precision drying, whilst the large diffuser enhances natural curls and volume.

Towel dry and detangle hair.
Plug the appliance into a suitable mains socket.

Use the high heat and speed settings for initial drying and the lower heat and speed settings to finish drying and for styling.
For additional control when styling, attach the concentrator nozzle and using the lower heat and speed settings, direct the airflow along the surface of the hair to be dried.
Use the cool shot button on warm hair to “set” the hair.
After use, switch off and unplug the appliance. Allow to cool before storing away.

ROOTED IN DERMATOLOGY AND HYDROTHERAPY
Avène has over 275 years of expertise in caring for sensitive skin and is recommended by dermatologists worldwide. At the heart of every formula, is clinically proven Avêne Thermal Spring Water to soothe, soften and calm the skin.
In Avène, a small village in the southwest of France that hugs the banks of the Orb River, flows a thermal spring - the source of unique, pure water with remarkable soothing and calming properties.
AVÈNE'S MISSION, PURPOSE & VALUES
Dedicated to sensitive skin and improving quality of life for all skin types, leveraging pharmaceutical and dermatological heritage and expertise.

name: BaByliss Japanese Steel Digital Hair Clipper
description:
Product details
The BaByliss Digital Japanese Steel Hair Clipper is a stylish, yet powerful hair clipper for exceptional cutting performance and effortless cutting on all hair lenghts. Create various hair styles from an on-trend fade or just a simple classic short back and sides, the choices are endless.

Long lasting cordless use
Lithium-ion power delivers long lasting, powerful, cordless use for up to 160 minutes from only a 3 hour charge.

Japanese Steel
Japanese Steel blade technology provide exceptional cutting performance for smooth and effortless trimming

Lenght Control
Up to 45 different lengths with 8 easy, click on comb guides and a 5 position easy, twist taper guide, allowing you to make small adjustments for the perfect fade and making the art of blending different lengths as easy as possible.

How to use

Attach the longer comb guide as required for the top of your hair – your clipper is supplied with 8 comb guides (grades 1-8). Each comb guide is labelled.
Switch the clipper on and the blades will start to move.
Hold the clipper to the front of your hair with the teeth pointing towards the back of your head and move the clipper towards your crown. Repeat as necessary, moving in rows from the front and the sides of your head to the back.
If you then wish to take the back and sides of your hair to a shorter length, switch off the appliance and attach a shorter comb guide.
Starting at the nape of the neck, with the comb guide flat against the head, move the clipper upwards and outwards over the area you want to take shorter.
Repeat on the sides of the hair, starting with the teeth of the clipper pointing upwards and comb guide flat against the area above the ear, again moving the clipper upwards and outwards.

name: Babyliss Deep Waves Waver
description:
Product details
Create must-have beautiful waves. An easy to use styler that creates luxurious waves in seconds. Simply clamp a section of hair in-between the large tourmaline-ceramic barrels for instant texture with a beautiful shiny finish.

Easy To Use
Simply press the hair between the barrels and waving plate for easy wave creation.

Ultra-Fast Styling
Advanced Ceramics™ heating system gives super-fast heat up and maintains high heat on every section for lasting results

Beautiful Deep Waves
Large tourmaline-ceramic waving plate creates smooth, soft, voluminous waves

Controlled Heat
3 temperature settings up to 200°C for instant results on all hair types

Up to 200°C
Large tourmaline-ceramic barrels and plate
Advanced Ceramics™ for fast heat recovery
3 heat settings for heat control
Stay cool safety tip
Auto shut off
2.5m swivel cord
Salon heat wrap
3 year guarantee


Click here to see a comparison between all BaByliss styling products
How to use
INSTRUCTIONS FOR USE
Ensure the hair is dry and combed through to remove any tangles.  Divide the hair into sections ready for styling.
Press the button marked ‘I/0’ to switch the appliance on.
Slide the switch to select the suitable heat setting for your hair type.

The LED indicator light will flash until optimum temperature has been reached. Once temperature has been reached the LED light will stop flashing.
Take a section of hair and place between the top barrels and bottom plate of the appliance.
Clamp the hair between the top barrels and bottom plate by pressing the appliance together.
Hold in place for 5-8 seconds. Take care to avoid the hot surfaces of the appliance coming into contact with the skin, in particular the eyes, ears, face and neck.
Release the appliance from the hair and gently slide down to the next section. Re-position the appliance to overlap the last wave created, to ensure a continuous wave effect in the hair.
Continue this action down the entire hair section, towards the ends of the hair.
Allow the section to cool before styling. Repeat on each hair section.
After use, press the button marked ‘I/0’ to switch off and unplug the appliance.
Allow to cool before storing away.
Hazards and Cautions
Do not use the appliance in the bathroom.
WARNING! Do not use this appliance near water contained in basins, bathtubs or other vessels.
Do not immerse the appliance in water or other liquids. Do not leave the appliance unattended when switched on or plugged in.
During use, do not place the appliance on any heat sensitive surface even when using the heat mat provided.
Take care to avoid the hot surface of the appliance coming into direct contact with the skin, in particular the eyes, ears, face and neck.
category: Babyliss Deep Waves Waver

name: Aptamil Anti-Reflux Baby Milk Formula Powder from Birth to 12 Months 800g
description:
Product details
Inspired by 40 years of research in early life science, our team have developed Aptamil Anti-Reflux Milk, nutritionally complete* and specifically designed for the dietary management of frequent reflux and regurgitation. Made with Carob Bean Gum to help your baby’s feeds stay down, Aptamil Anti-Reflux is nutritionally complete* and suitable from birth to 12 months. If you think that your baby has frequent reflux or regurgitation, speak to your healthcare professional. This product should not be used in combination with antacids or other thickeners and is not suitable for premature babies. *suitable as the sole source of nutrition from birth to 6 months and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months to 1 year. Aptamil is inspired by 50 years of research in early life science. Our team have combined our blend of ingredients with our unique process to develop Aptamil Anti-Reflux baby milk, tailored for the dietary management of frequent reflux and regurgitation. Our experts are here for you. Our team of baby feeding advisors are here to listen, and can offer personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting. Visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.
How to use
Moving to the next stage If you think your little one is ready to move on from Aptamil® Anti-Reflux, speak to a healthcare professional about the most suitable milk for your baby. Feeding Guide Aptamil® Anti-Reflux is a thickened feed. We recommend using a single hole fast flow teat. Feeding Guide Approx. age: Birth, Approx. weight 3.5kg, 7 3/4lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.5g): 3, Quantity of water per feed 90ml, 3fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 6 Approx. age: 2 weeks, Approx. weight 3.9kg, 8 1/2lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.5g): 4, Quantity of water per feed 120ml, 4fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 6 Approx. age: 2 months, Approx. weight 5kg, 11lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.5g): 6, Quantity of water per feed 180ml, 6fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 4 months, Approx. weight 6.5kg, 14 1/2lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.5g): 7, Quantity of water per feed 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 6 months**, Approx. weight 7.5kg, 16 1/2lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.5g): 7, Quantity of water per feed 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 5 Approx. age: 7-12 months, Approx. weight - kg, - lb, No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.5g): 7, Quantity of water per feed 210ml, 7fl oz, No. of feeds per 24 hours: 3 **Assumes weaning at 6 months. Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice. Important: Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop in this pack may change from time to time. How to use this pack To open, remove tamper evidence strip on the rim of pack. There is a handy leveller built into the pack. Store your scoop in the lid so that it is kept safe and secure. Click the lid securely shut to keep your powder fresh. Preparing your baby's feed Because powdered milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill. 1 Wash hands and sterilise all utensils according to manufacturers' instructions. 2 Boil 1 litre of freshly run water. Leave kettle to cool for 45 minutes and no longer. Measure the required amount of water (refer to feeding guide) into a sterilised bottle. Be careful of scalding. Do not use artificially softened or repeatedly boiled water. 3 Using the scoop provided level off the powder with the built-in leveller. Do not press/heap the powder. 4 Add the correct measure of powder to the water. Adding too many or too few scoops can be harmful. Place the sterilised teat and cap on the bottle. Hold the bottle horizontally and shake from left to right for 10 seconds, then hold it vertically and shake from top to bottom for 10 seconds. The time between adding the scoops and shaking the bottle should be as short as possible. 5 Leave the bottle to stand for 5 minutes to allow it to thicken. Turn the bottle upside down just before feeding. Check temperature of feed. Feed immediately. You may notice that your baby's stools change consistency when using this formula. This is completely normal. Important feeding advice Make up each feed as required. For hygiene reasons, do not store made up feeds, discard unfinished feeds as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours. Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding. Never add extra scoops or anything else to your baby's feed. Never leave your baby alone during feeding.
Hazards and Cautions
Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.

While every care has been taken to ensure this information is as accurate as possible, recipes and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice.

Food for Special Medical Purposes Ask for advice from your healthcare professional before use If you are concerned that your baby has frequent reflux or regurgitation you should speak to your healthcare professional. Aptamil Anti-Reflux should not be used in combination with antacids or other thickeners and is not suitable for premature infants. Important notice Breastfeeding is best for babies. Aptamil® Anti-Reflux is a food for special medical purposes for the dietary management of frequent reflux and regurgitation. It should only be used under medical supervision, after full consideration of the feeding options available including breastfeeding. Suitable for use as the sole source of nutrition for infants from birth and as part of a balanced diet from 6-12 months. This product should not be used in combination with antacids or other thickeners and is not suitable for premature infants. For enteral use only. When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.Store powder in a cool, dry place Do not refrigerate Use powder within 4 weeks of openingAmbient

name: Babymoov Nutribaby Opal Green 6 in 1 Baby Food Maker
description:
Product details
The multifunctional food prep maker for varied, healthy & tasty meals.

• 6-in-1 multi-purpose baby food processor (pre-programmed functions): steam cooking, blending, defrosting, sterilising and heating baby bottles and heating baby food jars
• Adaptable: food suitable for weaning your baby as well as for the whole family
• Several meals can be prepared in a single cycle: 2.2 litre capacity (1,500 ml for cooking, 700 ml for blending) 
• Saves time: a food processor that blends and cooks at the same time or separately - it's up to you!
• Cooking to suit your child and retain nutrients: 2 separate steamer baskets to cook different foods perfectly without mixing them up
• Cooks ALL types of foods: vegetables, fruit, meat, fish, grains, starches, eggs, etc.
• Suitable for weaning onto solids: 3 blending speeds to adapt the texture of your foods depending on your baby's age
• More flavour and vitamins: separate cooking water vessel
• Intuitive: built-in control panel and timer (audible and visual alarm, automatic cut-off)
• Easy care: all components are removable and dishwasher-safe (except electrical parts)
• Accessories included: one spatula 
• Lifetime warranty - terms and conditions on www.babymoov.co.uk

The Nutribaby(+) multi-purpose food prep machine is ideal for all stages of your child's development, from bottle-feeding to weaning and beyond.
This multi-purpose food processor features 6 automatic programmes, with 1 button = 1 function: steam cooking, blending, defrosting, heating baby food jars, sterilising and heating baby bottles. 
This food processor also features a central touchscreen console and a built-in timer (audible and visual alarm, automatic cut-off) making it super easy to use.

 Its 2 separate baskets guarantee food is steam-cooked to a turn, with all its flavours and vitamins preserved. Its 3 blending speeds along with its cooking water vessel mean you can adjust the texture as you wish, depending on your baby's age.

With its 2,200 ml capacity (1,500 ml for cooking and 700 ml for blending), you can prepare several meals in a single cycle!

As a baby food expert, Babymoov has been designing unique multi-purpose food prep makers for over 25 years: the best loved Nutribaby range! For the very first time, it's now possible to cook and blend at the same time. You can cook all types of foods: fruit and vegetables, meat, fish, eggs, grains, starches, etc. A real time-saver for new parents looking to give their children healthy, tasty home-made meals.

The Nutribaby(+) multi-purpose food prep maker is ideal for all stages of your child's development, from bottle-feeding to weaning and beyond. The multi-purpose Nutribaby(+) features 6 automatic programmes, with 1 button = 1 function: steam cooking, blending, defrosting, heating baby food jars, sterilising and heating baby bottles. This food processor also features a central touchscreen console and a built-in timer (audible and visual alarm, automatic cut-off).

With 2 separate cooking baskets, Nutribaby+ guarantees food is steam-cooked perfectly, with all natural flavours and nutrients preserved. Its 3 blending speeds along with the cooking water vessel mean you can adjust and adapt the texture of your foods, at each stage of the weaning process. You can then add even more flavour and vitamins using the cooking water captured in the separate vessel

• Composition: BPA-free Tritan, polypropylene
• Care: Baskets, bowls and accessories are dishwasher-safe
• Wattage: Heating 230V / 500W and Blending: 230V / 3 speeds
• Power supply: Mains operated (adaptor supplied)
• Product dimensions: 39.5 x 25 x 31.5 cm
Hazards and Cautions
WARNING: To avoid danger, if the electrical cable is
damaged, it must be replaced by the manufacturer, its
after-sales service department or a qualified electrician.
• Always disconnect the appliance from the supply if it is
left unattended and before assembling, disassembling
or cleaning.
• This appliance can be used by children from 8 years and
above and persons with reduced physical, sensory or
mental capabilities or lack of experience and knowledge if
they have been given supervision or instruction concerning
use of the appliance in a safe way and understand the
hazards involved.
• Children shall not play with the appliance.
• Cleaning and user maintenance shall not be made by
children without supervision.
• Any type of misuse of the appliance may result in a
potential injury.
• Be careful if hot liquid is poured into the blender as it can
be ejected out of the appliance due to
a sudden steaming.
• Respect heating times, and ensure the baby bottle and
its contents are at a suitable temperature before feeding
your baby.
• This appliance is intended to be used in household and
similar applications such as:
- staff kitchen areas in shops, offices and
other working environments;
- farm houses;
- by clients in hotels, motels and other residential
type environments;
- bed and breakfast type environments.
• Use plastic or glass baby bottles suitable for boiling, or other
heat-resistant recipients with this appliance.
• Always check your utensils prior to using them with
Nutribaby+ / XL.
• The appliance is only to be used with the base provided.
• Do not use any accessories other than those supplied.
• Switch off the appliance and disconnect from supply before
changing accessories or approaching parts that move
in use.
• Do not operate the blending unit continuously for more
than 30 seconds. Wait five seconds between each
blending cycle.
• The heating element surface is subject to residual heat
after use.

name: Bambaw Bamboo Cotton Buds - Pack Of 200
description:
Product details
Bambaw Bamboo Cotton Buds - Pack Of 200

Cotton buds are convenient and ordinary, so it is easy to forget about their impact on the environment. But we love using them: It has been estimated that we used over 500 billion of these worldwide in 2017.

Sadly, most are made of plastic, which needs centuries to break down. In the meantime, animals mistake it for food, which eventually kills them.

A sustainable alternative to plastic is bamboo. Bamboo cotton buds are biodegradable while being as sturdy and durable as the plastic version. So, they are the perfect alternative.
How to use
Use the bamboo cotton bud as a conventional cotton bud. Afterwards, you can dispose of it in your personal or local compost. A detailed digital user manual is provided.
Hazards and Cautions
Do not insert in your nose or ear canal
Ingredients
Cotton And Bamboo

name: Aptamil Follow On Milk 6-12 Months 2 x 600g 12kg
description:
Product details
Key features/benefits: Here to support your feeding journey, Aptamil Follow On Milk powder big pack is:

• The UK’s Number 1 brand for follow on milk*

• 2x600g pack format

• Contains vitamins A and C, and with Iron for normal cognitive development

• Contains GOS/FOS - our blend of Galacto and Fructo-oligosaccharides

Inspired by 50 years of breastmilk research, our team of scientists have developed Aptamil Follow On baby milk, the UK’s number 1 brand for follow on milk*. Enriched with key nutrients such as Vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system and iron to support normal cognitive development, Aptamil Follow On Milk is tailored to complement your baby’s weaning diet between 6-12 months. Our 1.2kg pack of Aptamil Follow On baby formula comes in a pack of 2 x 600g. Supporting you on your baby’s journey Your baby’s nutritional needs are changing as they grow. Aptamil Toddler milk 3 is designed specially to support your baby’s growth and development from 1 year as part of a varied balanced diet, as it contains vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system, and normal growth and development of bone.

*Source: IRI Infoscan Total Market MAT w/e 05/11/2022 domestic volume sales for Aptamil Follow On Milk Total UK The beginning of your baby’s life is a special and beautiful time, and we know just how important it is that your baby gets the nutrition they need at every stage of their development. Inspired by 50 years of breastmilk research, our passionate team of scientists have brought together our blend of ingredients and unique process, to support your baby on their feeding journey.

Trust us to support your unique experience at every step, from birth to toddlerhood. Our midwives, nutritionists and feeding advisors are always on hand to talk about feeding your baby. For personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting, please visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.

This product should reach you in perfect condition. If it is not satisfactory, please contact us. This guarantee does not affect your statutory rights.

Our Experts Are Here for You to listen and give you personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting. Our team of baby feeding advisors can offer support and advice.

UK: 0800 996 1000 (8:00-20:00 Monday-Friday)
Visit www.aptaclub.co.uk

ROI: 1 800 22 12 34 (8:30-17:30 Monday-Friday)
www.aptaclub.ie
ask@aptaclub.ie
Suitable for
6-12 Months
How to use
Preparing Your Baby's Feed
Approx. 1 beaker: No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.8g) 7, Quantity of water per feed: 210 ml / 7 fl.oz
After 6 months, once weaning is established, we recommend giving your baby about 1 pint (500-600ml) per day. Aptamil® Follow on Milk is formulated to help meet the increased nutritional needs of infants from 6 to 12 months. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.

Important: always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop may change from time to time.

How to Use This Pack
Inside the box are two foil sachets and a scoop to measure the correct amount of powder. For ease, remove one foil sachet from the box and store it until required. Open the other sachet with scissors, cutting along the top. To dose, carefully fold the open end of the foil sachet over. To maintain the best quality, we recommend using a clip* to reseal the sachet.

*Clip is not included.

Prep: Wash hands and sterilise all utensils.

Water: Boil 1 litre of freshly run water in a kettle then leave to cool for 30 minutes and no more so the water can reach the recommended temperature of 70°C. When ready, pour the right amount of water into a sterilised beaker, as per the feeding guide. Do not use artificially softened or repeatedly bolled water.

Powder: Using the scoop, add the powder to the water, as per the feeding guide. To make sure the right amount of powder is added, level off the powder with a clean, dry knife. Don't press or heap the powder as adding too much or too little formula could make your baby ill.

Shake: Place the sterilised lid on the beaker and shake straight away. For best results, shake vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds, until all of the powder is dissolved.

Cool the beaker by placing under a cold running tap or in a bowl of cold water, and check the temperature by placing a few drops on the inside of your wrist. The formula should feel lukewarm, but not hot. If possible, we'd recommend starting the feed straight away and finishing within 2 hours.


Important Feeding and Storage Advice
Make up each feed as required.
For hygiene reasons, do not store made up feeds, discard unfinished feeds as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never add extra scoops or anything else to your baby's feed.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.
Hazards and Cautions
Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.

While every care has been taken to ensure this information is as accurate as possible, recipes and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice.

This product is made to strict hygiene standards but because powdered formula milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions on preparation and storage may make your baby ill.

Important notice
Breastfeeding is best. Follow-on milk is only for babies over 6 months, as part of a mixed diet. If should not be used as a breastmilk substitute before 6 months. The decision to start weaning including the use of this product before 6 months should be made only on the advice of a doctor, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care, based on baby's individual needs. When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.

Storage
Store powder in a cool dry place. Do not refrigerate. Use powder within 4 weeks of opening.

name: Babymoov Lovenest Original antibacterial head support natural care
description:
Product details
Babymoov Lovenest Original antibacterial head support natural care

Lovenest Natural Care - the newborn organic cotton head support pillow promotes the healthy development of a well-rounded head within the first 3 months while baby's skull is still soft! Developed and patented by French Paediatrician Dr Maidenberg, the anti-flat head pillow , is specially angled and shaped to suit the shape of an infant's skull to ensure an even distribution of pressure across the back of the head, while still allowing freedom of movement. During the first months of their life, your baby can spend hours on their back.

To reduce the risk of flat head (plagiocephaly) from forming, use a Lovenest pillow under baby’s head on an activity mat, in their cot, pram or even a baby bouncer. Unique to the Lovenest Natural Care which is made in Portugal, it is specifically designed for newborn babies with a weak immune system. The copper thread, which is woven into the organic cotton mesh, eliminates 99.9% of bacteria, reduces odours, and protects the skin from infections. This exclusive patented technology is 100% natural and involves no chemical treatments atall. The Lovenest Natural Care is machine-washable at 30°C without damaging the anti-bacterial properties of the copper thread. Use the Lovenest Natural Care straight from birth and up to 3 -4 months old or until baby is able to roll over unaided.
Hazards and Cautions
It can be used from birth to 3 months
Stop using the head support once the child is able to turn over unaided
Important info
Country of Origin: Portugal

name: Babymoov Cosydream Original
description:
Product details
Babymoov Cosydream Original

Sleep is precious!

After spending nine months in your tummy, your newborn may feel unsettled by their new surroundings. They need to adapt from a fœtal position in which they felt safe and protected to a lying position stretching their unused and undeveloped abdominals. These new sensations may disrupt sleep and, consequently, development.

Furthermore, the sleeping position of babies flat on their back is recommended by the World Health Organisation (WHO) to combat sudden infant death syndrome.

Babymoov understand the importance of sleep and have designed for you and your little one, an innovative range for a safer and more comforting sleeping environment, all designed with the advice of medical professionals and fully tested by independent laboratories to ensure compliance with safety requirements

Features and benefits:
Perfect position for baby: back support and raised legs
Head support for a nice and round head
Memory foam for optimum comfort
Adjustable leg support roll according to baby’s size
Ultra-soft, breathable fabric
Can be used with a inclined cot wedge

Material composition:
Outside: Cotton/Polyester
Inside: 100% polyurethane

Dimensions: 58 x 38 x 8 cm

As trust is the must-have factor in baby equipment, Babymoov is committed to offering safe, quality products, all certified by independent laboratories. And Babymoov’s lifetime warranty on all its products vouches for this.

Age recommendation(min): 0+
Age recommendation(max): 4-6 months



Hazards and Cautions
IMPORTANT! Read carefully and keep for future reference.
WARNING
Stop using the product once your baby is 3 months old, or starts to roll over unaided, or is too big to fit into it properly. RISK OF SUFFOCATION.
Do not use pillows, blankets, or additional padding underneath or beside the infant. RISK OF SUFFOCATION.
Do not use this product in an adult bed. RISK OF SUFFOCATION.
Do not use this product at height. RISK OF FALLING.
Remove the child before moving the product.
Beware of the danger of placing the cot near naked flames and other sources of intense heat such as gas or electric heaters.
Stop using the product once the child starts moving around and wanting to turn over. This is because the child's movements may cause them to roll off the product and onto their side, or end up with their face against the mattress in a position where they cannot breathe.
Medical opinion states that babies gain this ability to move at around 3 months, but users should be reminded of the importance of preempting this and looking out for their child gaining these new skills.
Using the product beyond the indicated age can have serious consequences for the child.
Check that all parts of the product are correctly assembled before use.
Do not use the product if any components are broken or missing.
Right from birth, place your baby on their back, flat, in their own cot with a firm mattress. Never place them on their tummy or side.
Up to the age of 6 months, parents are recommended to sleep in the same room as their baby, placing the cot next to their bed. It is recommended to place your baby in their cot on their own, on a firm mattress the same size as the cot. No items should be placed in their cot: no cot bumpers, blankets, duvets, pillows, toys, or soft toys.
Ensure that the child’s chin does not rest on their chest by ensuring that two adult fingers can fit in the space between the chin and the torso, so that their breathing is not impeded.
Take into account the temperature of the room and the nightwear worn by the child, and ensure that the child is neither too hot nor too cold; excessive heat can endanger the life of your child. A temperature of 19°C is recommended. The air in the bedroom must not be too humid or too dry, and the room should be ventilated every day to provide fresh air.
Ensure that the belt does not press on the child's abdomen and thorax by ensuring that two adult fingers can fit in the space between the belt and the child's body.
It is designed to keep the child in position when they unexpectedly start to move for the first time, but it must not be used under any circumstances to restrain a child whose motor skills mean that they are too old to be placed in the product.
