description:
Product details
Contains vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system
Tailored to support toddler's nutritional needs
Vitamins A, C, D, calcium, iron, omega-3, nutri fibres (GOS/FOS)
Palm Oil Free
Oil Blend
Inspired by 50 Years of Early Life Nutrition Research

The beginning of your toddler's life is a special and beautiful time.

Our passionate team of more than 500 scientists and experts have developed our Aptamil® Toddler Milk, inspired by 50 years of research in early life nutrition. Our formulation contains vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system and is tailored to support your toddler's nutritional needs from 2+ years.

Aptamil® Toddler Milk is tailored to help meet the increased nutritional needs of toddlers aged 2+ years.

Nutri Fibres
GOS/FOS - Our blend of Galacto- and Fructo-oligosaccharides
Immunonutrient
Vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system
Omega-3 LCPs
Vitamins A & C and iron
Iron supports normal cognitive development
No artificial preservatives*

*as required by the legislation.

Supports a Toddler's Healthy Start*
2 Beakers a Day
2 x 150ml
Provides 100% of the recommended daily amount of vitamin D for toddlers*
*Calcium for normal growth and development of bone
Iodine to help support the normal growth of children

*Reference Nutrient Intake/Recommended Dietary Allowance as recommended for toddlers by the Department of Health (UK)/Food Safety Authority of Ireland
Suitable for
Suitable for toddlers aged 2-3 Years."}
How to use
Preparation and Usage
A Pack Designed for You

To open, remove tamper evidence strip on the rim of the pack.
There is a handy leveller built into the pack. Store your scoop in the lid so that it is kept safe and secure.
Click the lid securely shut to keep your powder fresh.

Preparing Your Toddler's Drink
We recommend giving your toddler about 2 x 150ml beakers of Aptamil® Toddler Milk a day, as part of a varied, balanced diet. Aptamil® Toddler Milk is specially formulated to help meet the increased nutritional needs of toddlers from 2 years onwards.

1 beaker: No. of level scoops per drink (1 scoop = 4.4g): 5; Quantity of water per drink: 150ml, 5fl oz

Important: Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop in this pack may change from time to time.

This product is made to strict hygiene standards but because powdered formula milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions on preparation and storage may make your toddler ill.

1 Water: Measure 150ml or 5fl.oz of boiled, cooled water into a clean beaker.
2 Powder: Using the scoop provided, add 5 levelled scoops of powder into the beaker. Do not press/heap the powder.
3 Shake: Place the clean lid on the beaker and shake straight away. For best results, shake vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds, until all of the powder is dissolved.
4 Check temperature and drink immediately.

Important Feeding Advice
Make up each drink as required.
For hygiene reasons, do not store made up drinks, discard unfinished drinks as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat drinks in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never add extra scoops or anything else to your toddler's drink.
Toddlers should be supervised at all times when feeding.
Hazards and Cautions
Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.

While every care has been taken to ensure this information is as accurate as possible, recipes and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice.

Storage
Store powder in a cool, dry place.
Do not refrigerate
Use powder within 4 weeks of opening>
Best Before: see above

Dental advice
Do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of drinks with your toddler's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice.

name: BaByliss Super Smooth Wide Straightener
description:
Product details
The BaByliss Wide professional straightener with a top temperature of 235°C with ultra fast heat up has  wider plates with ceramic coating to give a salon-perfect, smooth finish, ideal for straightening longer or thicker hair.

Ultra-Fast Styling
The Advanced Ceramics™ heating system gives ultra-fast heat up and gives consistent heat on every section

For Thicker Longer Hair
Wider plates to straighten larger sections of hair at one time for quick results

EFFORTLESS SMOOTHING
Sheer-glide tourmaline-ceramic coated plates for a smooth, shiny finish

PRECISE HEAT CONTROL
6 digital heat settings from 140oC
to 235oC for controlled styling and consistent results on all hair types

Up to 235°C
35mm wide tourmaline-ceramic coated plates
Advanced Ceramics™ heating system
6 Digital heat settings 140°C - 235°C
Ionic frizz-control
Extra-long plates
Auto shut off
2.5m swivel cord
Heat mat
5 year guarantee
How to use
Ensure hair is dry and combed through to remove any tangles. Divide the hair into sections ready for styling.
Turn the appliance on.
Select a heat setting suitable for your hair type.
Place a section of hair between the straightening plates, close to the roots.
Hold the hair firmly between the straightening plates and slide down the length of the hair, from root to tip.
Repeat for each section of hair.
Allow the hair to cool before combing through.
After use, turn off and unplug the appliance.
Allow the appliance to cool before storing away.
Hazards and Cautions
WARNING: Do not use this device in a bathtub, shower, or water-filled reservoir. Always keep out of the reach of children. (During and after use and while cooling) Consumer Helpline : 03705 133 191

name: BaByliss 10 in 1 Titanium Multi Trimmer
description:
Product details
The BaByliss 10 in 1 Titanium Multi Groomer is the ideal grooming tool for keeping your facial hair and body hair under control, trimmed and styled. The precision trimmer head features titanium blade technology for sharp, smooth cutting while the nose and ear trimmer removes unwanted hair sprouting from unwanted places.

Titanium
Titanium cutting blades for smooth cutting performance and long lasting sharpness.

Cordless Use
Powerful and flexible cordless use for up to 60 minutes

Face & Body Grooming
Includes specific comb guides for all over face and body grooming from 0.5mm to 9mm.

Pricing history
Was £29.99, was £19.99
How to use
To outline using the Precision Trimmer:
Do not attach a comb guide.
Hold the trimmer upside down with the blade facing downwards, yet flat against the skin.
Move the trimmer gently downwards in small strokes around the edge of the area you wish to outline.
Having defined the outline, hold the trimmer with the blades pointing upwards, yet flat against the skin and move the trimmer upwards against the direction of hair growth. This will trim the unwanted hair adjacent to
the outline.

Using the Nose & Ear Trimmer:
For the safe and easy removal of unwanted nose and ear hair use the rotary trimmer head.
Switch the trimmer on.
Insert the trimmer into the nose or ear and gently move the trimmer in a circular motion.
Only use the trimmer at the entrance to the ear or nose.
Hazards and Cautions
- Always keep out of the reach of children. (During and after use and while cooling)
- Consumer Helpline : 03705 133 191

name: BaByliss Hydro-Fusion Anti-Frizz 2100 Hair Dryer
description:
Product details
BaByliss 2100W Hydro-Fusion dryer

The BaByliss 2100W Hydro Fusion hair dryer is designed to deliver both fast drying and superior smooth results with radiant shine. The Advanced Plasma Technology uses a moisture balancing dual ionic system that combines both positive and negative ions, that work together to hydrate the hair and to eliminate frizz as you dry.  Your hair is left feeling silky and conditioned with luxurious shine.

The plasma effect
Hair feels soft and conditioned
Hair has no more frizz
Hair is exceptionally smooth
Hair looks shiny and radiant

Also includes a specially designed plasma flow diffuser that dries and forms luxuriously soft and shiny natural curls and a slim salon concentrator that gives a streamlined airflow for a smooth finish.
How to use
Gently towel dry and detangle wet hair.
Plug the appliance into a suitable mains socket.
Select the required heat and speed settings.
Use the high heat and speed settings for initial drying and the lower heat and speed settings to finish drying and for styling.
For additional control when styling, attach the concentrator nozzle and using the lower heat and speed settings, direct the airflow along the surface of the hair from root to tip. Use a brush to give smooth added volume.
To set your desired style use the cool shot button and gently blow cool air onto your warm hair.
To enhance natural curls and boost volume attach the plasma flow diffuser and set the speed and heat on low and scrunch hair from ends to roots. Be careful not to hold heat on hair for too long to avoid damage.
After use, switch off and unplug the appliance. Allow to cool before storing away.
Hazards and Cautions
Do not use the appliance in the bathroom.
WARNING! Do not use this appliance near water contained in basins, bathtubs or other vessels.
Do not immerse the appliance in water or other liquids. Do not leave the appliance unattended when switched on or plugged in.
During use, do not place the appliance on any heat sensitive surface.

Take care to avoid the hot surface of the appliance coming into direct contact with the skin, in particular the eyes, ears, face and neck.
Important info
Country of Origin: China

description:

The 11 in 1 BaByliss Carbon Titanium Multi Trimmer features 3 cutting heads to trim, style and shape your face and body hair. Create sharp, clean edges, shape your beard and tame your body hair with all the heads and accessories needed including a range of lengths and easy, washable heads to ensure perfect performance everytime.

Carbon Titanium
Precision engineered Carbon Titanium cutting blades for smooth cutting performance and long lasting sharpness.

Cordless Use
Powerful and flexible cordless use for up to 60 minutes

Face & Body Grooming
Includes 3 heads: A precision trimmmer, foil shaver and nose trimmer as well as specific comb guides for all over face and body grooming from 0.5mm to 9mm.
How to use
To outline using the Precision Trimmer:
Do not attach a comb guide.
Hold the trimmer upside down with the blade facing downwards, yet flat against the skin.
Move the trimmer gently downwards in small strokes around the edge of the area you wish to outline.
Having defined the outline, hold the trimmer with the blades pointing upwards, yet flat against the skin and move the trimmer upwards against the direction of hair growth. This will trim the unwanted hair adjacent to
the outline.

Using the Foil Shaver:
For an ultra-smooth finish, use the foil shaver attachment.
Always ensure the foil is not damaged before each use.
Switch the trimmer on.
Move the shaver gently over the skin, applying minimal pressure and shaving in the direction of hair growth.
Make sure to be particularly careful when trimming sensitive areas.

Using the Nose & Ear Trimmer:
For the safe and easy removal of unwanted nose and ear hair use the rotary trimmer head.
Switch the trimmer on.
Insert the trimmer into the nose or ear and gently move the trimmer in a circular motion.

description:
Product details
A unique Thermal Water Spray to calm, soothe and soften sensitive skin. Essential multi-use spray to refresh, calm and soften the skin, whilst soothing any sign of skin sensitivity.

Key benefits:
SOOTHES: A 64 % reduction in sensitivity*.

REPLENISHES the skin barrier of sensitive skin.

SOFTENS: Reduces feelings of skin discomfort and sensitivity to keep the skin healthy.

VEGAN.

FRAGRANCE-FREE.


*A decrease in skin sensitivity by 30% after five minutes and by 64% within the first week. Study conducted on more than 6,300 people with sensitive skin, including infants, children and adults.

Discover Avène’s skincare regime:
STEP1: Cleanse using any Avène Cleanser.
STEP2: Soothe with Avène Thermal Spring Water.
STEP3: Moisturise using any Avène Moisturiser of your choice.

We recommend using SPF protection daily.

More information on our brand:
ROOTED IN DERMATOLOGY AND HYDROTHERAPY
Avène has over 275 years of expertise in caring for sensitive skin and is recommended by dermatologists worldwide. At the heart of every formula, is clinically proven Avêne Thermal Spring Water to soothe, soften and calm the skin.
In Avène, a small village in the southwest of France that hugs the banks of the Orb River, flows a thermal spring - the source of unique, pure water with remarkable soothing and calming properties.
AVÈNE'S MISSION, PURPOSE & VALUES
Dedicated to sensitive skin and improving quality of life for all skin types, leveraging pharmaceutical and dermatological heritage and expertise.
Suitable for
The whole family.

All skin types.
How to use
For a soothing and refreshing effect, spray generously for several seconds, wait a moment and then gently pat dry with a towel.

For greater effectiveness: soak the cotton pad in the Avène Thermal Spring Water, place it on the sensitive area and spray again. Leave it on for 10 minutes.

name: BaByliss i-Stubble3 Beard Trimmer
description:
Product details
BaByliss i-Stubble 3 Beard Trimmer

15 ultra precise length settings let you maintain your preferred facial hair style at all times. Whether you’re looking for a short, shadow look, a longer stubble look, or even a short beard, the i-Stubble+ is the ultimate in stubble control.

Features

• Advanced comb guide for extra precision
• Flexing, contouring head tracks the curves of your face for extra comfort and control
• Motorised length control for precise adjustment
• 15 lenght settings between0.4mm to 5.0mm with ultra precise 0.2mm
• Memory length function
• LCD Screen displays selected length and battery charge level
• Skin friendly electro-chemically formed precision blades technology for extreme precision and sharpness
• 90 minute charge provides 45 minutes of cordless, high power
How to use
Set the cutting length as required.
It is always best to start cutting with a longer length first, then trim again if the length is longer than desired.
Hold the iStubble3 against the hair, the teeth of the comb guide should be pointing upwards and should be flat against the face.
Move the trimmer upwards through the hair, a little at a time, against the direction of hair growth. The floating and contouring head will follow the curves of your face to ensure both accuracy and comfort.
The iStubble will work most effectively when cutting through the hair at its own speed – never force through the hair. You may experience a little resistance when trimming the neck area, where hair is thicker and grows in many different directions. This is completely normal.
Just like shaving, extra time should be given when trimming under the neck area, as again this is where hairs grow in many different directions.
Never switch the trimmer off whilst in the hair.
- Flexing, contouring head for exceptional accuracy and comfort
- 15 motorised lengths for ultimate precision
- 0.4mm-15mm
- LCD Screen displays selected length and charge time remaining
- Protective comb guide delivers ultimate length consistency
- Rapid charging system
- 90 minute charge provides 60 minutes of cordless use
- Shaver style power lead and 3 pin plug adaptor
- 3 year guarantee
Hazards and Cautions
- Always keep out of the reach of children. (During and after use and while cooling)
- Consumer Helpline : 03705 133 191

From birth: Give one drop (0.028 ml) every day or as directed by a healthcare professional. Place 1 drop daily onto mother’s nipple or on a clean surface, such as a washed finger or a pacifier, and allow baby to suck for at least 30 seconds. Or mix one drop daily with food or drink.

SPECIFICALLY DESIGNED FOR BREASTFED BABIES.

Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.

name: Aptamil Advanced 1 First Formula Baby Milk Powder from Birth 800g
description:
Product details
Aptamil® Advanced First Infant Milk, suitable for babies from birth. Nutritionally Complete Infant Formula* (*suitable as a sole source of nutrition from birth and as part of a weaning diet from 6 months. As required by the legislation for all infant formula). - No artificial preservatives** (**As required by the legislation for all infant formula). The beginning of your baby's life is a special and beautiful time. Inspired by 50 years of research in early life science, our passionate team of more than 500 scientists and experts have developed Aptamil® Advanced First Infant Milk, which is suitable for combination feeding or for formula feeding.

Supporting you on your baby's journey - Aptamil® Advanced Follow On Milk is tailored for babies from 6 to 12 months as part of a varied, balanced diet. - Our unique blend of GOS/FOS and 2'FL - With Vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system Every Small Step Counts - Factory is 100% powered by renewable electricity and sends zero waste to landfill - Fully recyclable pack. Click the scoop back into the lid before recycling. We are devoted to providing you and your baby our very best. We don't produce for any supermarket own-label brands. Nutricia and Aptamil® are registered trademarks. Packaged in a protective atmosphere. Contents may settle in transit.
Suitable for
Suitable for babies from birth and aged 0-6 Months*. For 6-12 Months, use Aptamil Advanced 2 Follow On Formula Baby Milk Powder 6-12 Months 800g.

*Breastfeeding is best.
How to use
Preparation and Usage
A Pack Designed for You
Triple safety seal
To be sure your formula has not been opened and retains its freshness
Secure latch closure
Extra safety against contaminations and spills
Scoop storer
To keep your scoop and hands out of the power

Preparing Your Baby's Feed
Because powdered milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions may make your baby ill.

Approx. age: Up to 2 weeks; Approx. weight: 3.5kg, 7 3/4lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 3; Quantity water per feed: 90ml, 3fl. oz; No. feeds per 24 hours: 6

Approx. age: 2-4 weeks; Approx. weight: 3.9kg, 8 1/2lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 4; Quantity water per feed: 120ml, 4fl. oz; No. feeds per 24 hours: 5

Approx. age: 4-8 weeks; Approx. weight: 4.7kg, 10 1/2lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 5; Quantity water per feed: 150ml, 5fl. oz; No. feeds per 24 hours: 5

Approx. age: 8-12 weeks; Approx. weight: 5.4kg, 12lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 6; Quantity water per feed: 180ml, 6fl. oz; No. feeds per 24 hours: 5

Approx. age: 3-4 months; Approx. weight: 6.2kg, 13 3/4lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 6; Quantity water per feed: 180ml, 6fl. oz; No. feeds per 24 hours: 5

Approx. age: 4-5 months; Approx. weight: 6.9kg, 15 1/4lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 7; Quantity water per feed: 210ml, 7fl. oz; No. feeds per 24 hours: 5

Approx. age: 5-6 months; Approx. weight: 7.6kg, 16 3/4lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 7; Quantity water per feed: 210ml, 7fl. oz; No. feeds per 24 hours: 5

Approx. age: 7-12 weeks; Approx. weight: -kg, -lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6g): 7; Quantity water per feed: 210ml, 7fl. oz; No. feeds per 24 hours: 3

Assumes weaning at 6 months. Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice.

Important: Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop in this pack may change from time to time.Wash hands and sterilise all utensils according to manufacturers' instructions.Boil 1 litre of freshly run water. Leave kettle to cool for 30 minutes and no longer. Measure the required amount of water (refer to feeding guide) into a sterilised bottle. Be careful of scalding. Do not use artificially softened or repeatedly boiled water.Using the scoop provided, level off the powder with the built in leveller. Do not press/heap the powder.Add the correct measure of powder to the water. Adding too many or too few scoops can be harmful. Place the sterilised teat and cap on the bottle and shake immediately, vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds until the powder is dissolved.Cool under running tap. Check temperature of feed. Feed immediately.

Storage
Store powder in a cool, dry place.
Do not refrigerate.
Use powder within 4 weeks of opening.
Best Before: See base of pack
Hazards and Cautions
Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.

While every care has been taken to ensure this information is as accurate as possible, recipes and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice.

Important notice
Breastfeeding is best. Infant Milk should only be used on the advice of a doctor, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care.

When bottle feeding, do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.

IMPORTANT FEEDING ADVICE
Make up each feed as required.
For hygiene reasons, do not store made up feeds, discard unfinished feeds as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never add extra scoops or anything else to your baby's feed.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.

Dedicated to sensitive skin and improving quality of life for all skin types, leveraging pharmaceutical and dermatological heritage and expertise.

DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS.

name: BARBER PRO Foot Peel
description:
Product details
The BARBER PRO Foot Peel is the perfect fix for rough, dry or callused skin. The 90 minute treatment uses 16 natural plant botanicals to remove dead or tough skin to leave your feet feeling healthier and smoother in just 7 days.
● Softening
● Revitalising
● Rehydrating
These dual layered boots slip over the feet for a relaxing treatment that softens and revitalises the skin. Within a few days, the hard skin will begin to peel away, revealing refreshed feet beneath. Salicylic Acid removes the buildup of dirt and bacteria present on the feet, cleansing the pores and dissolving dead skin cells to leave the feet feeling smooth and healthy. Paired with Glycolic Acid, this formula exfoliates and increases cell renewal to ensure that all toxins are lifted from the skin and new growth is encouraged.
Suitable for
Do not use if pregnant, Diabetic, suffer from Asthma, Eczema, Dermatitis, Psoriasis or any other skin related issues.
How to use
1. Remove booties from pouch and cut along cutting lines.
2. Wash feet thoroughly with clean water only.
3. Dry feet thoroughly and place clean, dry feet into the booties.
4. Wear for a maximum of 90 minutes. You should do this while sitting down to avoid the risk of slipping.
5. Remove booties and thoroughly wash hands and feet with water only.
Hazards and Cautions
External use only. Avoid contact with eyes and damaged skin. In case of eye contact, rinse thoroughly with water. Keep out of reach of children.
Important info
Country of Origin: Korea

name: Avène Very High Protection Cream SPF50 Face Sun Cream for Sensitive Skin 50ml
description:
Product details
The SPF 50+ Cream offers ultra-broad spectrum daily sun protection. It is ideal for dry sensitive facial skin. Its velvety, melting texture moisturises the face for up to 8 hours* leaving the skin nourished and soft to the touch. The SPF 50+ Cream leaves an imperceptible, non-shiny finish on the skin when applied and is an excellent base for everyday make-up. The formula is also water resistant.
*Biometrological kinetic IH study, single application, 22 subjects
DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS.

Key benefits:
PHOTOPROTECTIVE : Photostable UVB-UVA and blue light filters that combat the deleterious effects of sun rays. -95% cell damage induced by solar radiation*.

ANTIOXIDANT : Helps to protect cells against free radicals**.

IMPERCEPTIBLE : For a natural complexion and invisible protection every day. Use as a day cream.

WATER RESISTANT : Protects the skin from the harmful effects of the sun even when swimming.

FORMULATED to limit its impact on marine ecosystems***.


*In-vitro test on reconstructed epidermis exposed to blue light - Quantification of DNA oxidation.
**In-vitro test
***Non-eco-toxic filters, with no impact on 3 representative species of marine biodiversity (one species of coral, one species of phytoplankton and one of zooplankton) according to tests carried out by the Oceanological Observatory of Banyuls-sur-Mer, partner of the European Marine Biological Resource Center, at concentrations representative of those found in the environment for sunscreens; and formulas optimized to promote their biodegradability according to the OECD 301B test.

STEP2: Smooth with Avène Hydrance Boost Serum.

name: Aptamil Hungry First Baby Milk Formula Powder from Birth 800g
description:
Product details
• IMPORTANT NOTICE: Breastfeeding is best. Infant milk is suitable from birth, when babies are not breastfed and should only be used on the advice of a doctor, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care. Inspired by 50 years of research in early life science, Aptamil® Hungry First Infant milk is a Nutritionally Complete Infant Formula* especially when it’s too early to wean*. Aptamil® Hungry First Infant Milk is suitable from birth. Our 800g pack of Aptamil® Hungry First Infant Milk powder contains a scoop leveller inside the pack for more accuracy when preparing your baby’s feed. It also comes complete with a secure scoop store to keep your hands and scoop out of the powder. Supporting you on your baby’s journey Aptamil® Follow on milk 2 is tailored for babies from 6 to 12 months as part of a varied and balanced diet. With vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system. *As required by the legislation for all infant milk, it is nutritionally complete and suitable as a sole source of nutrition from birth when it’s too early to introduce solid foods, or as part of a weaning diet from 6 to 12 months. Before introducing solid foods, speak to your healthcare professional.
Suitable for
Suitable for infants from birth up to 6 months or as part of a weaning diet up to 12 months.
How to use
Preparation and Usage
Preparing Your Baby's Feed
Approx. age: Up to 2 weeks; Approx. weight: 3.5 kg, 7 3/4 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 3; Quantity of water per feed: 90 ml, 3 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 6
Approx. age: 2-4 weeks; Approx. weight: 3.9 kg, 8 1/2 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 4; Quantity of water per feed: 120 ml, 4 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 4-8 weeks; Approx. weight: 4.7 kg, 10 1/2 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 5; Quantity of water per feed: 150 ml, 5 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 8-12 weeks; Approx. weight: 5.4 kg, 12 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 6; Quantity of water per feed: 180 ml, 6 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 3-4 months; Approx. weight: 6.2 kg, 13 3/4 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 6; Quantity of water per feed: 180 ml, 6 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 4-5 months; Approx. weight: 6.9 kg, 15 1/4 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 7; Quantity of water per feed: 210 ml, 7 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 5-6 months; Approx. weight: 7.6 kg, 16 3/4 lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 7; Quantity of water per feed: 210 ml, 7 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 5
Approx. age: 7-12 months; Approx. weight: - kg, - lb; No. of level scoops per feed (1 scoop = 4.6 g): 7; Quantity of water per feed: 210 ml, 7 fl.oz; No. of level per 24 hours: 3
Assumes weaning at 6 months. Your baby may need more or less than the feeding guide above. This information is given as a guide only. Consult your healthcare professional if you require more advice. Important: Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop in this pack may change from time to time.
This product is made to strict hygiene standards but because powdered formula milks are not sterile, failure to follow instructions on preparation and storage may make your baby ill.
Prep: Wash hands and sterilise all utensils.
Water: Boil 1 litre of freshly run water in a kettle then leave to cool for 30 minutes and no more so the water can reach the recommended temperature of 70°C. When ready, pour the right amount of water into a sterilised bottle as per the feeding guide.
Do not use artificially softened or repeatedly bolled water.
Powder: Using the scoop, add the powder to the water, as per the feeding guide. To make sure the right amount of powder is added, use the leveller on the inside of the box to level off the scoops. Don't press or heap the powder as adding too much or too little formula could make your baby ill.
Shake: Place the sterilised teat and cap on the bottle and shake straight away. For best results, shake vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds, until all of the powder is dissolved.
Cool the bottle by placing under a cold running tap or in a bowl of cold water, and check the temperature by placing a few drops on the inside of your wrist. The formula should feel lukewarm, but not hot. If possible, we'd recommend starting the feed straight away and always finishing within 2 hours.
Important feeding and storage advice
Make up each feed as required.
For hygiene reasons, do not store made up feeds, discard unfinished feeds as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat feeds in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never add extra scoops or anything else to your baby's feed.
Never leave your baby alone during feeding.
"}
Hazards and Cautions
Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.

While every care has been taken to ensure this information is as accurate as possible, recipes and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice.

Important notice: Breastfeeding is best. Infant Milk is suitable from birth, when babies are not breastfed and should only be used on the advice of a doctor, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care.

When bottle feeding do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.

Storage
Store powder in a cool, dry place.
Do not refrigerate.
Use powder within 4 weeks of opening.

name: Aptamil Advanced 3 Formula Toddler Milk Powder 1-3 Years 800g
description:
Product details
Supporting you on your toddler's journey - Just 2x150ml beakers each day of Aptamil® Advanced Toddler Milk is one way to help support your toddler's nutrient intake in combination with a varied, balanced diet.

Every Little Step Counts
Factory is 100% powered by renewable electricity and sends zero waste to landfill

Fully recyclable pack. Click the scoop back into the lid before recycling.


We are devoted to providing you and your baby our very best. We don't produce for any supermarket own-label brands. Nutricia and Aptamil® are registered trademarks. Packaged in a protective atmosphere. Contents may settle in transit.

Other Information
Packaged in a protective atmosphere. Contents may settle in transit.
Nutricia and Aptamil® are registered trademarks.

The experts at Aptaclub are here for you, to listen and give you personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting.

UK: 0800 996 1000 (8:00-20:00 Monday - Friday)
ROI : 1 800 22 12 34 (8:30-17:30 Monday-Friday)

Vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system
Iron to support normal cognitive development
Calcium for normal growth and development of bone
Suitable for
Suitable for Toddlers aged 1-3 Years.
How to use
Preparation and Usage

Preparing Your Toddler's Drink
Because powdered milks are not sterile, failure to follow preparation and storage instructions may make your toddler ill.
We recommend giving your toddler about 2 x 150ml beakers of Aptamil® Advanced Toddler Milk a day, as part of a varied, balanced diet. Aptamil® Advanced Toddler Milk is formulated to help meet the increased nutritional needs of toddlers from 1 year onwards.
Approx. 1 beaker: No. of level scoops per drink (1 scoop = 5g): 5; Quantity of water per drink: 150ml, 5fl. oz

Important: Always use the scoop provided; please note the colour of the scoop in this pack may change from time to time.Measure 150ml or 5fl.oz of boiled, cooled water into a clean beaker.Using the scoop provided, add 5 levelled scoops of powder into the beaker. Do not press/heap the powder.Place the clean lid on the beaker and shake immediately, vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds, until the powder is dissolved.Check temperature and serve immediately.

Important Feeding Advice
Make up each drink as required.
For hygiene reasons, do not store made up drinks, discard unfinished drinks as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat drinks in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never add extra scoops or anything else to your toddler's drink.
Toddlers should be supervised at all times when feeding.
Do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk drinks with your toddler's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice.

Storage
Store powder in a cool, dry place.
Do not refrigerate.
Use powder within 4 weeks of opening.
Best Before: See base of pack
Hazards and Cautions
Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.

Important notice Breastfeeding is best. Follow On Milk is only for babies over 6 months, as part of a mixed diet. It should not be used as a breastmilk substitute before 6 months. The decision to start weaning in during the use of this product before 6 months should be made only on the advice of a doctor, dietitian, pharmacist, or other professional responsible for maternal and child care, based on baby's individual needs. When bottle feeding, do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of milk feeds with your baby's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice. Make sure your baby's teeth are cleaned after the last feed at night.

name: Aptamil Toddler Milk 3 1 Years 800g
description:
Product details
Designed to support your toddler’s increased nutritional needs, Aptamil Toddler Milk is:

● Made with Omega-3 and our blend of Galacto and Fructo-oligosaccharides (GOS/FOS)
● A source of Iron to support normal cognitive development
● Contains calcium, and vitamin D to support the normal function of the immune system
● Contains no artificial preservatives* and made with a palm oil free oil blend

Your baby’s first birthday is just the beginning of many future firsts. Between the ages of 1 - 3, your baby’s nutritional needs are increasing as they experience their most rapid period of development. Inspired by 50 years of early life nutrition research, and tailored specifically to complement your toddler's changing nutritional needs, just two x 150ml beakers of Aptamil Toddler formula milk provides 100% of the recommended daily amount of vitamin D for toddlers**. Made with our unique blend of GOS/FOS*** Omega-3, calcium and vitamins A and C, Aptamil Toddler Milk also contains iron to support normal cognitive development. Our 800g pack of Aptamil Growing Up Milk powder contains a scoop leveler inside the pack for more accuracy when preparing your toddler’s beaker. It also comes complete with a secure scoop storer to keep your hands and scoop out of the powder. *As required by the legislation **As recommended for toddlers by the Department of Health (UK)/Food Safety Authority of Ireland ***A blend of Galacto- and Fructo-oligosaccharides The beginning of your baby’s life is a special and beautiful time, and we know just how important it is that your baby gets the nutrition they need at every stage of their development. Inspired by 50 years of early life nutrition research our passionate team of scientists have brought together our blend of ingredients and unique process to support your baby on their feeding journey. Trust us to support your unique experience at every step, from birth to toddlerhood.

Our midwives, nutritionists and feeding advisors are always on hand to talk about feeding your baby. For personalised advice and support on feeding and parenting, please visit www.aptaclub.co.uk to contact us via WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger or Live Chat, or call us on 0800 996 1000.
Suitable for
Suitable for toddlers aged 1+ Years. For 2-3 years, use Aptamil 3 Toddler Milk Powder 2-3 Years 800g.
How to use
Preparation and Usage

A Pack Designed for You
Double safety strip
To be sure your formula has not been opened and retains its freshness
Scoop leveller
To get the dose just right
Scoop storer
To keep your scoop and hands out of the powder

Preparing Your Toddler's Drink
We recommend giving your toddler about 2 x 150ml beakers of Aptamil® Toddler Milk a day, as part of a varied, balanced diet. Aptamil Toddler Milk is specially formulated to help meet the increased nutritional needs of toddlers from 1 year onwards.

1 Beaker: No. of level scoops per drink (1 scoop = 5.0g): 5, Quantity of water per drink: 150 ml / 5 fl oz

Important: Always use the scoop provided, please note the colour of the scoop in this pack may change from time to time.

Water: Measure 150ml or 5fl.oz of boiled, cooled water into a clean beaker.

Powder: Using the scoop provided, add 5 levelled scoops of powder into the beaker. Do not press/heap the powder.

Shake: Place the clean lid on the beaker and shake straight away. For best results, shake vertically and vigorously for at least 10 seconds, until all of the powder is dissolved.

Check temperature and drink immediately.


Important feeding and storage advice
Make up each drink as required.
For hygiene reasons, do not store made up drinks, discard unfinished drinks as soon as possible, and always within 2 hours.
Do not heat drinks in a microwave, hot spots may occur and cause scalding.
Never add extra scoops or anything else to your toddler's drink.
Toddlers should be supervised at all times when feeding.
Hazards and Cautions
Food Supplements are intended to supplement the diet and should not be regarded as a substitute for a balanced and varied diet or a healthy lifestyle.

While every care has been taken to ensure this information is as accurate as possible, recipes and nutrition content may occasionally change. As a result, we recommend that you always read the label carefully before consuming any product. The Nutrient Reference Value (NRV) or Reference Intake (RI) as a percentage, helps to show the contribution that a product or portion size can make towards daily intakes. This information is provided as a guide and is not individual advice.

Important info
Dental advice: Do not allow prolonged or frequent contact of drinks with your toddler's teeth as this increases the risk of tooth decay. Ask your healthcare professional or dentist for advice.

Storage
Store powder in a cool, dry place.
Do not refrigerate.
Use powder within 4 weeks of opening

description:
Product details
A naturally luminous mineral foundation that delivers buildable sheer-to-full coverage while protecting and improving skin, in a special deluxe size.

Made with only 5 mineral ingredients, this award-winning loose powder foundation promotes clearer, healthier-looking skin over time. The talc-free formula provides all-day coverage, minimises the look of pores and imperfections, and won't clog pores, cause breakouts or settle into fine lines.

Women
How to use
Swirl, Tap, Buff® application:

- TAP away any excess.
